| +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getMultiLineVal | | This is used to | | ues(String | | retrieve the multiple | | fieldValue,int | | line values from a | | startLine,int | | narrative field that | | endLine) | | holds a value of | | | | multiple lines. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fieldValue: This | | | | is the field | | | | value or variable | | | | value. It can | | | | also be an | | | | expression that | | | | gets a field or | | | | variable value. | | | | | | | | - int startLine: | | | | This is the | | | | integer that | | | | determines the | | | | starting line of | | | | the string value | | | | that is to be | | | | obtained. | | | | | | | | - int endLine: This | | | | is the integer | | | | that determines | | | | the end line of | | | | the string value | | | | that is to be | | | | obtained. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | string value based on | | | | the defined starting | | | | and end lines. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getPartValue(St | | This method is used | | ring | | to get a particular | | fieldValue,int | | part of a field value | | start,int length) | | based on a specified | | | | starting position and | | | | a defined data | | | | length. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fieldValue: This | | | | is the field | | | | value or variable | | | | value. String tagName: | | | | This is the SWIFT | | | | Tag. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | value of the | | | | specified Tag in the | | | | original incoming | | | | SWIFT message. | | | | | | | | *[NOTE]{.underline} | | | | *: | | | | | | | | If the specified Tag | | | | is part of a set of | | | | loop Tags (i.e., Tags | | | | that occure more than | | | | once in a SWIFT | | | | message with each | | | | occurance having a | | | | different value), | | | | this method returns | | | | the value of the | | | | first Tag occruance. | | | | To retrieve the | | | | values of all | | | | occrances, use the | | | | stp.getSWIFTTagArray( | | | | String | | | | tagName) method. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getSWIFTTagArra | | This is used to | | y(String | | identify the values | | tagName) | | of an array of Tags | | | | in a SWIFT message | | | | with loop Tags (i.e., | | | | Tags that occur more | | | | than once in SWIFT | | | | message with each | | | | occurance having a | | | | different value). | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String tagName: | | | | This is the SWIFT | | | | Tag. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | values of the | | | | specified Tag in the | | | | original incoming | | | | SWIFT message. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | SWIFT message with | | | | loop Tags 20, 21, and | | | | 32A: | | | | | | | | > {1:F01PTSABMAAXXXX0 | | | | 000000000}{2:O4121327 | | | | 050628WFBIUS6SAXXX975 | | | | 13549410506290806N}{4 | | | | : | | | | > | | | | > :20:ref1 | | | | > | | | | > :21:IMCO17062001 | | | | > | | | | > :32A:170620USD15000 | | | | ,00 | | | | > | | | | > :20:ref2 | | | | > | | | | > :21:IMCO17062001 | | | | > | | | | > :32A:170620USD35000 | | | | ,00 | | | | > | | | | > :72:WE IRREVOCABLY | | | | > UNDERTAKE TO REMIT | | | | > | | | | > PROCEEDS TO YOUR | | | | > THROUGH BANK PLC | | | | > LONDON | | | | > | | | | > AT MATURITY. | | | | > | | | | > REMITTANCE CHARGES | | | | > FOR DRAWER'S | | | | > ACCOUNT. | | | | > | | | | > -}{5:{MAC:1E926B77} | | | | {CHK:1C7477C9B526}}{S | | | | :{SAC:}{COP:P}} | | | | | | | | The STP method | | | | stp.getSWIFTTagArray( | | | | “32A”) | | | | will retrieve all the | | | | values for Tag 32A: | | | | | | | | - 170620USD15000,00 | | | | | | | | - 170620USD35000,00 | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.init(trx2ChgTyp | | This method is used | | e, | | to set the initial | | chg2CollType, | | exchange rate to be | | rule2UnpaidType, | | used for charge | | unpaid2CollType) | | transactions. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | local customer | | | | payment currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllLocalPayCcy | | | | ('USD') | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayAt(pay | | This is used to set | | At) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION | | | | ); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayBy(pay | | This is used to set | | By) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer) | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayBy(STP.C | | | | HG_FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllUnpaidCcy | | This method is used | | (ccy) | | to set the initial | | | | value of ‘Unpaid CCY’ | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | unpaid charges | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.AllsetUnpaidCcy(\ | | | | ‘USD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefChargeSco | | This is used to | | pe(scope) | | define the condition | | | | when retrieving | | | | deferred charges | | | | (i.e., transaction | | | | reference, main | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - scope: This is | | | | the condition for | | | | retrieving the | | | | deferred charges. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | SCOPE_MAINREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | the main or whole | | | | transaction), | | | | TRXREF (deferred | | | | charges are to be | | | | retrieved from a | | | | transaction | | | | reference), | | | | MAINWITHTRXREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | both the main and | | | | transaction | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefPayAt(Str | | This is used to set | | ing | | the initial value of | | commCode, String | | the deferred charge’s | | at) | | Paid At field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the value | | | | of the commission | | | | code | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | STP.setDefPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDiscRate(Str | | This is used to set | | ing, | | the discount rate. | | int) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code or the | | | | commission code | | | | string list array | | | | | | | | - int: This is the | | | | discount rate | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate(comLi | | | | st,'20'); | | | | | | | | OR | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate('IPL | | | | C_OPEN_COMM','20\ | | | | ‘); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayAt(commCo | | This is used to set | | de,payAt) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field | | | | in a transaction with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). The | | | | default value is | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayAt('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | _AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayBy(comCod | | This is used to set | | e,payBy) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field in a | | | | transaction with a | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | If the charge is paid | | | | by the ‘Local | | | | Customer’: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayBy('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | _FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.addFieldList(Se | | This is used to | | rverDataInfo | | append the fields to | | sdi, String | | an SQL query. These | | fieldName) | | are the fields that | | | | are to be selected | | | | from a table in the | | | | database. This method | | | | is normally used | | | | together with other | | | | methods such as | | | | stp.addSQLCondition() | | | | and | | | | stp.executeQuery() in | | | | order to get the | | | | expected field value. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ServerDataInfo | | | | sdi: This is the | | | | field list. When | | | | it is to add the | | | | first field in | | | | the field list, a | | | | null value should | | | | be provided. | | | | | | | | - String fieldName: | | | | This is the field | | | | name that is to | | | | be included in | | | | the field list. | | | | | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.addSQLCondition | | This is used to | | (ServerDataInfo | | append the fields | | sdi,String fieldName, | | that compose the SQL | | String fieldValue) | | select condition. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ServerDataInfo | | | | sdi: This is the | | | | SQL condition | | | | list. If it is | | | | used as a | | | | condition for the | | | | first field, a | | | | null value should | | | | be provided. | | | | | | | | - String fieldName: | | | | This is the field | | | | used in the SQL | | | | Where condition. | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fieldValue: This | | | | is placed as the | | | | value of the | | | | field that is | | | | defined in String | | | | fieldName. | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | String. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.executeQuery(St | | This is used to | | ring | | execute an SQL query | | tableName,ServerDataI | | with user-defined | | nfo | | conditions. | | fldList,ServerDataInf | | | | o | | Parameters: | | sqlCondition) | | | | | | String tableName: | | | | This is the table | | | | name. | | | | | | | | - ServerDataInfo | | | | fldList: This is | | | | the field list. | | | | | | | | - ServerDataInfo | | | | sqlCondition: | | | | This is the query | | | | condition. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | value of the fields | | | | that are defined in | | | | the field list. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getDBFieldValue | | This method is used | | (HashMap | | to get the field | | hmResult, String | | value from an object | | fieldName) | | parameter. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - HashMap hmResult: | | | | This is the | | | | object parameter | | | | which value is | | | | retrieved from | | | | the database and | | | | assigned to a | | | | field. | | | | | | | | - String fieldName: | | | | This is the field | | | | that is assigned | | | | with the value | | | | obtained from the | | | | database. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.proAssign(Strin | | This is used to | | g | | assign an incoming | | bu,String function) | | SWIFT message to a | | | | transaction function. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String bu: | | | | This is the | | | | business unit. | | | | | | | | - String | | | | function: This | | | | is the function. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | stp.proAssign("BOCPC | | | | 001","inswift_test | | | | "); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setBU(String | | This is used to | | buName) | | define the business | | | | unit that is to | | | | receive the message. | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | buName: This | | | | is the business | | | | unit that is to | | | | receive the | | | | incoming message. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | //21: 1004XXXXXXX | | | | | | | | var s = | | | | stp.getSWIFTTagValue( | | | | ‘21’) | | | | | | | | if (s.substr(1,4) == | | | | '1001') | | | | | | | | stp.setBU(‘1001’); | | | | | | | | else | | | | | | | | stp.setBU(‘1002’); | | | | | | | | RESULT: C_UNIT_CODE | | | | = ‘1002’ | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.writeLog(String | | This method is used | | ) | | to write log details | | | | for user notification | | | | or debugging in the | | | | EE log file. | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String: This | | | | is the text to be | | | | written into the | | | | log file. | | | | | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | var | | | | sMsgType=stp.getSWIFT | | | | TagValue("B6").subs | | | | tr(1,3); | | | | | | | | stp.writeLog("sMsgTy | | | | pe:"+sMsgType); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

#######

####### Business Unit: Variables

Figure 6. Variables for STP Incoming SWIFT – Business Unit

STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED

This is used for retrieving the value of deferred charges.

STP.CHG_AT_FREE

This is used for retrieving the value of the waived charges.

STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION

This is used to retrieve the value of the charge to be paid at transaction.

STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the foreign customer.

STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the local customer.

STP.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT

This is used to retrieve the business unit level.

STP.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE

This is used to retrieve the comm. level.

STP.LEVEL__COUNTRY

This is used to retrieve the country level.

STP.LEVEL_CUSTOMER

This is used to retrieve the customer level.

STP.LEVEL_STANDARD

This is used to retrieve the standard level.

STP.MAINWITHTRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.SCOPE_MAINREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.TRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a transaction number setting.

#######

####### Function: Methods

Figure 6. Methods for STP Incoming SWIFT – Function

Method Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.SYS_GetExchang | | This method is used | | eRate(String | | to retrieve the | | fromCCY,String | | exchange rate value. | | toCCY,String | | | | rateType):double | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fromCCY: This | | | | is the From CCY | | | | value. | | | | | | | | - String toCCY: | | | | This is the To | | | | CCY value. | | | | | | | | - String | | | | rateType: This | | | | is the rate type | | | | value. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.SYS_GetPayment | | This method is used | | Routing() | | to get the payment | | | | record and display it | | | | on the transaction | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.addTrxCharge(co | | This method is used | | mCode) | | to add a charge with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - comCode: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code list array | | | | or commission | | | | code string | | | | defined in the | | | | standing module | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | transaction charge | | | | object. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | To add a Letter of | | | | Credit Issue | | | | Commission | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | 'IPLC_OPEN_COMM,EP | | | | LC_POST_CHG'; | | | | | | | | var trxChg = | | | | stp.addTrxCharge(comL | | | | ist); | | | | | | | | or | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘]; | | | | | | | | stp.addTrxCharge(comL | | | | ist); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.calEndWorkingDa | | This method is used | | te(String | | to get the end | | strCntyCode, String | | working date based on | | strStartDate, String | | the start date and | | strDaysValue, String | | the number of days | | strBeforeOrAfter, | | delayed. | | String strlfCheckHol, | | | | String | | Parameters: | | strlfJumpHol) | | | | | | - strCntyCode: This | | | | is the country | | | | code. This is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | - strStartDate: | | | | This is the | | | | starting date. | | | | This is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | - strDaysValue: | | | | This is the | | | | number of days | | | | delayed. This is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | - strBeforeOrAfter: | | | | This is the | | | | Before or After | | | | flag setting. The | | | | possible values | | | | are A, the | | | | default value, | | | | and B. | | | | | | | | - strIfCheckHol: | | | | This flag setting | | | | indicates whether | | | | or not to check | | | | holiday dates. | | | | The possible | | | | values are Y, the | | | | default value, | | | | and N. | | | | | | | | - strIfJumpHol: | | | | This flag setting | | | | indicates whether | | | | or not to include | | | | the holiday dates | | | | in the | | | | calculation. The | | | | possible values | | | | are N, the | | | | default value, | | | | and Y. This | | | | parameter is only | | | | available if the | | | | strfCheckHol | | | | value is Y. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | date. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.calculate(commL | | This method is used | | istArr, | | to calculate charges. | | calPara) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commListArr: This | | | | is the commission | | | | code list array. | | | | The array follows | | | | this order: | | | | Commission Code1, | | | | Commission | | | | Code 2. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - calPara: This | | | | is the parameter | | | | string array, | | | | which may contain | | | | the following | | | | variables. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - trxCcy is the | | | | currency of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - amount is the | | | | amount involved | | | | in the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - sDate is the | | | | start date of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - eDate is the end | | | | date of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - from is the | | | | location of the | | | | sender of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - to is the | | | | location of the | | | | recipient of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - baseDay is the | | | | base number of | | | | days used in the | | | | calculation of | | | | interests. | | | | | | | | - plusTimes is the | | | | number of times | | | | the charges are | | | | to be calculated. | | | | | | | | - extendFldsArr | | | | allows the values | | | | of the fields to | | | | be stored, making | | | | these fields | | | | reusable. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var parameter = | | | | ['USD','100000', | | | | '2011-3-23','2011- | | | | 4-23','US','CN', | | | | '360','null',null | | | | ]; | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | var result = | | | | stp.calculate(comList | | | | ,parameter); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.capureDefCharge | | This method is used | | sByScope() | | to retrieve the | | | | deferred charges | | | | according to the | | | | condition defined in | | | | the | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | () | | | | system method. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | | | | | | | | stp.capureDefChargesB | | | | yScope() | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.checkHoliday(St | | This method is used | | ring | | to check whether or | | strDate,String | | not a given date is a | | strSubCntyCode) | | holiday. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String strDate: | | | | This is the date | | | | to be verified as | | | | a holiday. | | | | | | | | - String | | | | strSubCntyCode: | | | | This is the | | | | sub-country code | | | | (or country | | | | code). | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | Boolean. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **stp.confirmCharge() | | This is used to | | ** | | confirm all charges | | | | and calculate the | | | | charges in the | | | | application server. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.day1MustBeLater | | This method is used | | ThanDay2(String | | to check that the | | strFirstDay, String | | first Date field | | strSecondDay) | | value is later than | | | | the second Date field | | | | value. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - strFirstDay: This | | | | is the first | | | | date. | | | | | | | | - strSecondDay: | | | | This is the | | | | second date. | | | | | | | | If the first date is | | | | later than the second | | | | date, this returns | | | | True; otherwise, it | | | | returns False. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **stp.demergeWithDO() | | This method is used | | ** | | to indicate whether a | | | | particular message | | | | type is to be | | | | demerged into one | | | | transaction with the | | | | data object. This has | | | | the same function as | | | | the | | | | SWIFT_INCOMING_WITH | | | | DO | | | | system parameter. If | | | | this system method is | | | | not defined in the | | | | STP Setting function, | | | | the system uses the | | | | system parameter | | | | setting. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignBalTo | | This is used to get | | talAmt(ccy) | | the total balance | | | | amount of the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | currency in which | | | | the resulting | | | | balance is to be | | | | returned | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var balAmtLocal = | | | | stp.getForeignBalTota | | | | lAmt("USD"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectAmt() | | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollAmt = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollChg = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollVAT = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayAmt() | | the total amount paid | | | | by the foreign | | | | customer, including | | | | the charge payment | | | | and VAT payment | | | | amounts. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayAmt = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var | | | | forTotalPayCharges = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayVAT = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLineValue(St | | This method is used | | ring | | to get a specified | | fieldValue,int | | line value of a | | line) | | narrative Tag that | | | | may hold a value of | | | | multiple lines. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String field | | | | value: This is | | | | any string value. | | | | | | | | - int line: This is | | | | used to determine | | | | which line value | | | | is to be | | | | returned. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | value that is | | | | obtained according to | | | | the line number that | | | | is specified through | | | | the parameters. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLines(String | | This is used to | | fieldValue) | | return a line from a | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fieldValue: This | | | | is the source | | | | field of the line | | | | to be retrieved. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalBalTota | | This is used to get | | lAmt(ccy) | | the total balance | | | | amount of the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | currency in which | | | | the resulting | | | | balance is to be | | | | returned | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var balAmtLocal = | | | | stp.getLocalBalTotalA | | | | mt("USD"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectAmt() | | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollAmt | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getMultiLineVal | | This is used to | | ues(String | | retrieve the multiple | | fieldValue,int | | line values from a | | startLine,int | | narrative field that | | endLine) | | holds a value of | | | | multiple lines. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fieldValue: This | | | | is the field | | | | value or variable | | | | value. It can | | | | also be an | | | | expression that | | | | gets a field or | | | | variable value. | | | | | | | | - int startLine: | | | | This is the | | | | integer that | | | | determines the | | | | starting line of | | | | the string value | | | | that is to be | | | | obtained. | | | | | | | | - int endLine: This | | | | is the integer | | | | that determines | | | | the end line of | | | | the string value | | | | that is to be | | | | obtained. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | string value based on | | | | the defined starting | | | | and end lines. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getPartValue(St | | This method is used | | ring | | to get a particular | | fieldValue,int | | part of a field value | | start,int length) | | based on a specified | | | | starting position and | | | | a defined data length | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | fieldValue: This | | | | is the field | | | | value or variable | | | | value. It can | | | | also be an | | | | expression that | | | | gets a field or | | | | variable value. | | | | | | | | - int start: This | | | | is the integer | | | | used to specify | | | | the starting | | | | position of the | | | | string value. | | | | | | | | - int length: This | | | | is the integer | | | | used to specify | | | | the length of the | | | | string value that | | | | is to be | | | | obtained. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | string value based on | | | | the defined starting | | | | position and length. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getSWIFTTagArra | | This is used to | | y(String | | identify the values | | tagName) | | of an array of Tags | | | | in a SWIFT message | | | | with loop Tags (i.e., | | | | Tags that occur more | | | | than once in SWIFT | | | | message with each | | | | occurance having a | | | | different value). | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String tagName: | | | | This is the SWIFT | | | | Tag. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | values of the | | | | specified Tag in the | | | | original incoming | | | | SWIFT message. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | SWIFT message with | | | | loop Tags 20, 21, and | | | | 32A: | | | | | | | | > {1:F01PTSABMAAXXXX0 | | | | 000000000}{2:O4121327 | | | | 050628WFBIUS6SAXXX975 | | | | 13549410506290806N}{4 | | | | : | | | | > | | | | > :20:ref1 | | | | > | | | | > :21:IMCO17062001 | | | | > | | | | > :32A:170620USD15000 | | | | ,00 | | | | > | | | | > :20:ref2 | | | | > | | | | > :21:IMCO17062001 | | | | > | | | | > :32A:170620USD35000 | | | | ,00 | | | | > | | | | > :72:WE IRREVOCABLY | | | | > UNDERTAKE TO REMIT | | | | > | | | | > PROCEEDS TO YOUR | | | | > THROUGH BANK PLC | | | | > LONDON | | | | > | | | | > AT MATURITY. | | | | > | | | | > REMITTANCE CHARGES | | | | > FOR DRAWER'S | | | | > ACCOUNT. | | | | > | | | | > -}{5:{MAC:1E926B77} | | | | {CHK:1C7477C9B526}}{S | | | | :{SAC:}{COP:P}} | | | | | | | | The STP method | | | | stp.getSWIFTTagArray( | | | | “32A”) | | | | will retrieve all the | | | | values for Tag 32A: | | | | | | | | - 170620USD15000,00 | | | | | | | | - 170620USD35000,00 | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getSWIFTTagValu | | This is used to | | e(String | | identify the value of | | tagName):String | | a Tag in a SWIFT | | | | message. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Foreign Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer account | | | | number field | | | | name. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.mapForeignCust(" | | | | BENE_ID", | | | | "BENE_NM", | | | | "BENE_CCY", | | | | "BENE_ACNO"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapLocalCust(cu | | This method is used | | stID, | | to define the field | | custName, custCCY, | | names that are | | custACNO) | | related to the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer account | | | | number | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.mapLocalCust("AP | | | | PL_ID","APPL_NM" | | | | ,“CUST_PAY_CCY"," | | | | CUST_ACNO"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllCollCcy(c | | This method is used | | cy) | | to set the initial | | | | charge collect | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | local customer | | | | payment currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllLocalPayCcy | | | | ('USD') | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayAt(pay | | This is used to set | | At) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION | | | | ); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayBy(pay | | This is used to set | | By) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer) | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayBy(STP.C | | | | HG_FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllUnpaidCcy | | This method is used | | (ccy) | | to set the initial | | | | value of ‘Unpaid CCY’ | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | unpaid charges | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.AllsetUnpaidCcy(\ | | | | ‘USD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefChargeSco | | This is used to | | pe(scope) | | define the condition | | | | when retrieving | | | | deferred charges | | | | (i.e., transaction | | | | reference, main | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - scope: This is | | | | the condition for | | | | retrieving the | | | | deferred charges. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | SCOPE_MAINREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | the main or whole | | | | transaction), | | | | TRXREF (deferred | | | | charges are to be | | | | retrieved from a | | | | transaction | | | | reference), | | | | MAINWITHTRXREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | both the main and | | | | transaction | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefPayAt(Str | | This is used to set | | ing | | the initial value of | | commCode, String | | the deferred charge’s | | at) | | Paid At field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the value | | | | of the commission | | | | code | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | STP.setDefPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDiscRate(Str | | This is used to set | | ing, | | the discount rate. | | int) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code or the | | | | commission code | | | | string list array | | | | | | | | - int: This is the | | | | discount rate | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate(comLi | | | | st,'20'); | | | | | | | | OR | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate('IPL | | | | C_OPEN_COMM','20\ | | | | ‘); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayAt(commCo | | This is used to set | | de,payAt) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field | | | | in a transaction with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). The | | | | default value is | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayAt('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayBy(commCo | | This is used to set | | de,payBy) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field in a | | | | transaction with a | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | If the charge is paid | | | | by the ‘Local | | | | Customer’: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayBy('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.isResetFunc() | | This is used to reset | | | | the function settings | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | Boolean. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAutoProcess( | | This is used to | | boolean | | decide whether the | | bAuto) | | pending or master | | | | record is to be | | | | generated directly in | | | | the database by | | | | running STP or as a | | | | record with an S | | | | status. In case of | | | | the latter, a Fix | | | | function must process | | | | the record. This is | | | | similar to the result | | | | of saving a | | | | transaction in the EE | | | | system. This method | | | | must be set before | | | | creating the scripts | | | | for the transaction | | | | field value. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - Boolean | | | | bAuto: This may | | | | be set as either | | | | True or False. | | | | Setting this to | | | | True indicates | | | | that the pending | | | | or master record | | | | is to be | | | | generated | | | | directly into the | | | | database; setting | | | | this to False, on | | | | the other hand, | | | | indicates that | | | | the record is to | | | | be generated as a | | | | record with an S | | | | status. | | | | | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setFunc(String | | This is used for | | funcName) | | setting STP | | | | functions. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | funcName: This | | | | is used to | | | | identify which | | | | function is to be | | | | used for the | | | | incoming message | | | | demerging | | | | process. The | | | | function | | | | specified may be | | | | an Add Pending or | | | | Add Master | | | | transaction | | | | function. It may | | | | also be an Edit | | | | Pending or Edit | | | | Master | | | | transaction | | | | function. | | | | | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | var sMark | | | | =stp.getSWIFTTagValue | | | | ("21").substr(0,4); | | | | | | | | if(sMark == | | | | "EXCO"){ | | | | | | | | stp.setFunc("EXCO_R | | | | eceiveMT400"); | | | | | | | | } else | | | | | | | | { | | | | | | | | stp.setFunc("Receive | | | | _MT400"); | | | | | | | | } | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setVatRate(comm | | This is used for | | mCodee, | | setting VAT rate in | | vat value) | | the STP side. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: | | | | This is the name | | | | of the commission | | | | code. | | | | | | | | - vat value: This | | | | is the VAT rate | | | | in percentage. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | stp.setRe | | | | AssignField(String st | | | | rField) | | | | | | | | This is used to c | | | | hange the value of C | | | | MAIN_REF. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | stp.setRe | | | | AssignField(String st | | | | rField) | | | | | | | | stp.setRe | | | | AssignField(String st | | | | rField) | | | | | | | | This is used to c | | | | hange the value of C | | | | MAIN_REF. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setReAssignFiel | | This is used to | | d(String | | change the value of | | strField) | | C_MAIN_REF. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

#######

####### Function: Variables

Figure 6. Variables for STP Incoming SWIFT – Function

STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED

This is used for retrieving the value of deferred charges.

STP.CHG_AT_FREE

This is used for retrieving the value of the waived charges.

STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION

This is used to retrieve the value of the charges to be paid at transaction.

STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the foreign customer.

STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the local customer.

STP.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT

This is used to retrieve the business unit level.

STP.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE

This is used to retrieve the comm. level.

STP.LEVEL__COUNTRY

This is used to retrieve the country level.

STP.LEVEL_CUSTOMER

This is used to retrieve the customer level.

STP.LEVEL_STANDARD

This is used to retrieve the standard level.

STP.MAINWITHTRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.SCOPE_MAINREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.TRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a transaction number setting

{#section-11 .CS-head2}

Incoming XML

The following sections list the methods and variables used in the STP settings for incoming XML messages.

####### Business Unit: Methods

Figure 6. Methods for STP Incoming XML – Business Unit

Method Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.addTrxCharge(co | | This method is used | | mCode) | | to add a charge with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - comCode: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code list array | | | | or commission | | | | code string | | | | defined in the | | | | standing module | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | transaction charge | | | | object. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | To add a Letter of | | | | Credit Issue | | | | Commission | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | 'IPLC_OPEN_COMM,EP | | | | LC_POST_CHG'; | | | | | | | | var trxChg = | | | | stp.addTrxCharge(comL | | | | ist); | | | | | | | | or | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘]; | | | | | | | | stp.addTrxCharge(comL | | | | ist); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.calculate(commL | | This method is used | | istArr, | | to calculate charges. | | calPara) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commListArr: This | | | | is the commission | | | | code list array. | | | | The array follows | | | | this order: | | | | Commission Code1, | | | | Commission | | | | Code 2. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - calPara: This | | | | is the parameter | | | | string array, | | | | which may contain | | | | the following | | | | variables. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - trxCcy is the | | | | currency of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - amount is the | | | | amount involved | | | | in the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - sDate is the | | | | start date of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - eDate is the end | | | | date of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - from is the | | | | location of the | | | | sender of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - to is the | | | | location of the | | | | recipient of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - baseDay is the | | | | base number of | | | | days used in the | | | | calculation of | | | | interests. | | | | | | | | - plusTimes is the | | | | number of times | | | | the charges are | | | | to be calculated. | | | | | | | | - extendFldsArr | | | | allows the values | | | | of the fields to | | | | be stored, making | | | | these fields | | | | reusable. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var parameter = | | | | ['USD','100000', | | | | '2011-3-23','2011- | | | | 4-23','US','CN', | | | | '360','null',null | | | | ]; | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | var result = | | | | stp.calculate(comList | | | | ,parameter); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.capureDefCharge | | This method is used | | sByScope() | | to retrieve the | | | | deferred charges | | | | according to the | | | | condition defined in | | | | the | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | () | | | | system method. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | | | | | | | | stp.capureDefChargesB | | | | yScope() | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **stp.confirmCharge() | | This is used to | | ** | | confirm all charges | | | | and calculate the | | | | charges in the | | | | application server. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.day1MustBeLater | | This method is used | | ThanDay2(String | | to check that the | | strFirstDay, String | | first Date field | | strSecondDay) | | value is later than | | | | the second Date field | | | | value. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - strFirstDay: This | | | | is the first | | | | date. | | | | | | | | - strSecondDay: | | | | This is the | | | | second date. | | | | | | | | If the first date is | | | | later than the second | | | | date, this returns | | | | True; otherwise, it | | | | returns False. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignBalTo | | This is used to get | | talAmt(ccy) | | the total balance | | | | amount of the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | currency in which | | | | the resulting | | | | balance is to be | | | | returned | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var balAmtLocal = | | | | stp.getForeignBalTota | | | | lAmt("USD"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectAmt() | | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollAmt = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollChg = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollVAT = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayAmt() | | the total amount paid | | | | by the foreign | | | | customer, including | | | | the charge payment | | | | and VAT payment | | | | amounts. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayAmt = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var | | | | forTotalPayCharges = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayVAT = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalBalTota | | This is used to get | | lAmt(ccy) | | the total balance | | | | amount of the local | | | | customer. Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | currency in which | | | | the resulting | | | | balance is to be | | | | returned | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var balAmtLocal = | | | | stp.getLocalBalTotalA | | | | mt("USD"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectAmt() | | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollAmt | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollChg | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalCollVAT | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalPa | | This is used to get | | yAmt() | | the total amount paid | | | | by the local | | | | customer, including | | | | charge and VAT | | | | payments. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayAmt = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalPayA | | | | mt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalPa | | This is used to get | | yCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayChg = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalPayC | | | | harge() | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalPa | | This is used to get | | yVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayVAT = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalPayV | | | | AT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getXMLNodeValue | | This is used to get | | (String | | the value of a tag or | | tagName):String | | node in an XML file. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String tagName: | | | | This is the node | | | | in the XML file. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | stp.writeLog("Receiv | | | | e | | | | xml start"); | | | | | | | | var | | | | MsgType=stp.getXMLNod | | | | eValue("msg-os-intf- | | | | id"); | | | | | | | | if(MsgType=="IMLC.00 | | | | 1.ImpLcApplctn") | | | | | | | | { | | | | | | | | stp.setFunc("IPLC_R | | | | eceiveLCFromCE"); | | | | | | | | } | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.init(trx2ChgTyp | | This method is used | | e, | | to set the initial | | chg2CollType, | | exchange rate to be | | rule2UnpaidType, | | used for charge | | unpaid2CollType) | | transactions. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - trx2ChgType: This | | | | is the exchange | | | | rate applied | | | | between | | | | Transaction- and | | | | Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - chg2CollType: | | | | This is the | | | | exchange rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Collect- | | | | and Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - rule2UnpaidType: | | | | This is the | | | | exchange rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Unpaid- | | | | and Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - unpaid2CollType: | | | | This is the | | | | exchange rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Collect- | | | | and Charge | | | | Unpaid-Currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.init("Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapDynamicParas | | This method is used | | (dynaPara) | | to calculate charges | | | | based on dynamic | | | | fields. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - dynaPara: This is | | | | the array of | | | | dynamic fields. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var criteriaFieldsArr | | | | = [‘channel_type’, | | | | ‘cust_type’, | | | | ‘busi_type’]; | | | | | | | | stp.mapDynamicParas(c | | | | riteriaFieldsArr); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapForeignCust( | | This method is used | | custID, | | to define the field | | custName, custCCY, | | names that are | | custACNO) | | related to the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - custID: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer Id. | | | | | | | | - custName: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the coreign | | | | customer Name. | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Foreign Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer account | | | | number field | | | | name. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.mapForeignCust(" | | | | BENE_ID", | | | | "BENE_NM", | | | | "BENE_CCY", | | | | "BENE_ACNO"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapLocalCust(cu | | This method is used | | stID, | | to define the field | | custName, custCCY, | | names that are | | custACNO) | | related to the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - custID: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer Id. | | | | | | | | - custName: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer name. | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer account | | | | number | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.mapLocalCust("AP | | | | PL_ID","APPL_NM" | | | | ,“CUST_PAY_CCY"," | | | | CUST_ACNO"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllCollCcy(c | | This method is used | | cy) | | to set the initial | | | | charge collect | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | bank collection | | | | currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllCollCcy('U | | | | SD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllDefPayAt( | | This method is used | | String | | to set the deferred | | at) | | charges Pay at value. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | deferred Pay At | | | | charge. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllLocalPayC | | This method is used | | cy(ccy) | | to set the value of | | | | the ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | local customer | | | | payment currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllLocalPayCcy | | | | ('USD') | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayAt(pay | | This is used to set | | At) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION | | | | ); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayBy(pay | | This is used to set | | By) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer) | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayBy(STP.C | | | | HG_FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllUnpaidCcy | | This method is used | | (ccy) | | to set the initial | | | | value of ‘Unpaid CCY’ | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | unpaid charges | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.AllsetUnpaidCcy(\ | | | | ‘USD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefChargeSco | | This is used to | | pe(scope) | | define the condition | | | | when retrieving | | | | deferred charges | | | | (i.e., transaction | | | | reference, main | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - scope: This is | | | | the condition for | | | | retrieving the | | | | deferred charges. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | SCOPE_MAINREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | the main or whole | | | | transaction), | | | | TRXREF (deferred | | | | charges are to be | | | | retrieved from a | | | | transaction | | | | reference), | | | | MAINWITHTRXREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | both the main and | | | | transaction | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefPayAt(Str | | This is used to set | | ing | | the initial value of | | commCode, String | | the deferred charge’s | | at) | | Paid At field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the value | | | | of the commission | | | | code | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | STP.setDefPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDiscRate(Str | | This is used to set | | ing, | | the discount rate. | | int) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code or the | | | | commission code | | | | string list array | | | | | | | | - int: This is the | | | | discount rate | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate(comLi | | | | st,'20'); | | | | | | | | OR | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate('IPL | | | | C_OPEN_COMM','20\ | | | | ‘); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayAt(commCo | | This is used to set | | de,payAt) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field | | | | in a transaction with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). The | | | | default value is | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayAt('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | _AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayBy(comCod | | This is used to set | | e,payBy) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field in a | | | | transaction with a | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | If the charge is paid | | | | by the ‘Local | | | | Customer’: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayBy('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | _FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setBU(String | | This is used to | | buName) | | define the business | | | | unit that is to | | | | receive the message. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String | | | | buName: This | | | | is the business | | | | unit that is to | | | | receive the | | | | incoming message. | | | | | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | //21: 1004XXXXXXX | | | | | | | | var s = | | | | stp.getSWIFTTagValue( | | | | ‘21’) | | | | | | | | if (s.substr(1,4) == | | | | '1001') | | | | | | | | stp.setBU(‘1001’); | | | | | | | | else | | | | | | | | stp.setBU(‘1002’); | | | | | | | | RESULT: C_UNIT_CODE | | | | = ‘1002’ | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

####### Business Unit: Variables

Figure 6. Variables for STP Incoming XML – Business Unit

STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED

This is used for retrieving the value of deferred charges.

STP.CHG_AT_FREE

This is used for retrieving the value of the waived charges.

STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION

This is used to retrieve the value of the charges paid at transaction.

STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the foreign customer.

STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the local customer.

STP.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT

This is used to retrieve the business unit level.

STP.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE

This is used to retrieve the comm. level.

STP.LEVEL__COUNTRY

This is used to retrieve the country level.

STP.LEVEL_CUSTOMER

This is used to retrieve the customer level.

STP.LEVEL_STANDARD

This is used to retrieve the standard level.

STP.MAINWITHTRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.SCOPE_MAINREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.TRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a transaction number setting

#######

####### Function: Methods

Figure 6. Methods for STP Incoming XML – Function

Method Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.addTrxCharge(co | | This method is used | | mCode) | | to add a charge with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - comCode: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code list array | | | | or commission | | | | code string | | | | defined in the | | | | standing module | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | transaction charge | | | | object. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | To add a Letter of | | | | Credit Issue | | | | Commission | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | 'IPLC_OPEN_COMM,EP | | | | LC_POST_CHG'; | | | | | | | | var trxChg = | | | | stp.addTrxCharge(comL | | | | ist); | | | | | | | | or | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘]; | | | | | | | | stp.addTrxCharge(comL | | | | ist); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.calculate(commL | | This method is used | | istArr, | | to calculate charges. | | calPara) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commListArr: This | | | | is the commission | | | | code list array. | | | | The array follows | | | | this order: | | | | Commission Code1, | | | | Commission | | | | Code 2. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - calPara: This | | | | is the parameter | | | | string array, | | | | which may contain | | | | the following | | | | variables. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - trxCcy is the | | | | currency of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - amount is the | | | | amount involved | | | | in the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - sDate is the | | | | start date of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - eDate is the end | | | | date of the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - from is the | | | | location of the | | | | sender of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - to is the | | | | location of the | | | | recipient of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - baseDay is the | | | | base number of | | | | days used in the | | | | calculation of | | | | interests. | | | | | | | | - plusTimes is the | | | | number of times | | | | the charges are | | | | to be calculated. | | | | | | | | - extendFldsArr | | | | allows the values | | | | of the fields to | | | | be stored, making | | | | these fields | | | | reusable. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var parameter = | | | | ['USD','100000', | | | | '2011-3-23','2011- | | | | 4-23','US','CN', | | | | '360','null',null | | | | ]; | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | var result = | | | | stp.calculate(comList | | | | ,parameter); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.capureDefCharge | | This method is used | | sByScope() | | to retrieve the | | | | deferred charges | | | | according to the | | | | condition defined in | | | | the | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | () | | | | system method. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | | | | | | | | stp.capureDefChargesB | | | | yScope() | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **stp.confirmCharge() | | This is used to | | ** | | confirm all charges | | | | and calculate the | | | | charges in the | | | | application server. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.day1MustBeLater | | This method is used | | ThanDay2(String | | to check that the | | strFirstDay, String | | first Date field | | strSecondDay) | | value is later than | | | | the second Date field | | | | value. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - strFirstDay: This | | | | is the first | | | | date. | | | | | | | | - strSecondDay: | | | | This is the | | | | second date. | | | | | | | | If the first date is | | | | later than the second | | | | date, this returns | | | | True; otherwise, it | | | | returns False. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignBalTo | | This is used to get | | talAmt(ccy) | | the total balance | | | | amount of the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | currency in which | | | | the resulting | | | | balance is to be | | | | returned | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var balAmtLocal = | | | | stp.getForeignBalTota | | | | lAmt("USD"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectAmt() | | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollAmt = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollChg = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | CollectVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollVAT = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalCo | | | | llectVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayAmt() | | the total amount paid | | | | by the foreign | | | | customer, including | | | | the charge payment | | | | and VAT payment | | | | amounts. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayAmt = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var | | | | forTotalPayCharges = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getForeignTotal | | This is used to get | | PayVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayVAT = | | | | stp.getForeignTotalPa | | | | yVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalBalTota | | This is used to get | | lAmt(ccy) | | the total balance | | | | amount of the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | currency in which | | | | the resulting | | | | balance is to be | | | | returned | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var balAmtLocal = | | | | stp.getLocalBalTotalA | | | | mt("USD"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectAmt() | | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollAmt | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollChg | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalCo | | This is used to get | | llectVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalCollVAT | | | | = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalColl | | | | ectVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalPa | | This is used to get | | yAmt() | | the total amount paid | | | | by the local | | | | customer, including | | | | charge and VAT | | | | payments. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayAmt = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalPayA | | | | mt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalPa | | This is used to get | | yCharge() | | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayChg = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalPayC | | | | harge() | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getLocalTotalPa | | This is used to get | | yVAT() | | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayVAT = | | | | stp.getLocalTotalPayV | | | | AT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getXMLNodeValue | | This is used to get | | (String | | the value of a tag or | | tagName):String | | node in an XML file. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String tagName: | | | | This is the node | | | | in the XML file. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | stp.writeLog("Receiv | | | | e | | | | xml start"); | | | | | | | | var | | | | MsgType=stp.getXMLNod | | | | eValue("msg-os-intf- | | | | id"); | | | | | | | | if(MsgType=="IMLC.00 | | | | 1.ImpLcApplctn") | | | | | | | | { | | | | | | | | stp.setFunc("IPLC_R | | | | eceiveLCFromCE"); | | | | | | | | } | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.init(trx2ChgTyp | | This method is used | | e, | | to set the initial | | chg2CollType, | | exchange rate to be | | rule2UnpaidType, | | used for charge | | unpaid2CollType) | | transactions. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - trx2ChgType: This | | | | is the exchange | | | | rate applied | | | | between | | | | Transaction- and | | | | Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - chg2CollType: | | | | This is the | | | | exchange rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Collect- | | | | and Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - rule2UnpaidType: | | | | This is the | | | | exchange rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Unpaid- | | | | and Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - unpaid2CollType: | | | | This is the | | | | exchange rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Collect- | | | | and Charge | | | | Unpaid-Currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.init("Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapDynamicParas | | This method is used | | (dynaPara) | | to calculate charges | | | | based on dynamic | | | | fields. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - dynaPara: This is | | | | the array of | | | | dynamic fields. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var criteriaFieldsArr | | | | = [‘channel_type’, | | | | ‘cust_type’, | | | | ‘busi_type’]; | | | | | | | | stp.mapDynamicParas(c | | | | riteriaFieldsArr); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapForeignCust( | | This method is used | | custID, | | to define the field | | custName, custCCY, | | names that are | | custACNO) | | related to the local | | | | customer. The | | | | para,eters are: | | | | | | | | - custID: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer Id. | | | | | | | | - custName: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the coreign | | | | customer Name. | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Foreign Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer account | | | | number field | | | | name. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.mapForeignCust(" | | | | BENE_ID", | | | | "BENE_NM", | | | | "BENE_CCY", | | | | "BENE_ACNO"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.mapLocalCust(cu | | This method is used | | stID, | | to define the field | | custName, custCCY, | | names that are | | custACNO) | | related to the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - custID: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer Id. | | | | | | | | - custName: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer name. | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer account | | | | number | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.mapLocalCust("AP | | | | PL_ID","APPL_NM" | | | | ,“CUST_PAY_CCY"," | | | | CUST_ACNO");
