| +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllCollCcy(c | | This method is used | | cy) | | to set the initial | | | | charge collect | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | bank collection | | | | currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllCollCcy('U | | | | SD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllDefPayAt( | | This method is used | | String | | to set the deferred | | at) | | charges Pay at value. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | deferred Pay At | | | | charge. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllLocalPayC | | This method is used | | cy(ccy) | | to set the value of | | | | the ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | local customer | | | | payment currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllLocalPayCcy | | | | ('USD') | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayAt(pay | | This is used to set | | At) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION | | | | ); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllPayBy(pay | | This is used to set | | By) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer) | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAllPayBy(STP.C | | | | HG_FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setAllUnpaidCcy | | This method is used | | (ccy) | | to set the initial | | | | value of ‘Unpaid CCY’ | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | unpaid charges | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.AllsetUnpaidCcy(\ | | | | ‘USD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefChargeSco | | This is used to | | pe(scope) | | define the condition | | | | when retrieving | | | | deferred charges | | | | (i.e., transaction | | | | reference, main | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - scope: This is | | | | the condition for | | | | retrieving the | | | | deferred charges. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | SCOPE_MAINREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | the main or whole | | | | transaction), | | | | TRXREF (deferred | | | | charges are to be | | | | retrieved from a | | | | transaction | | | | reference), | | | | MAINWITHTRXREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | both the main and | | | | transaction | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setDefChargeScope | | | | (STP.SCOPE_MAINREF); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDefPayAt(Str | | This is used to set | | ing | | the initial value of | | commCode, String | | the deferred charge’s | | at) | | Paid At field. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the value | | | | of the commission | | | | code | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | STP.setDefPayAt(STP.C | | | | HG_AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setDiscRate(Str | | This is used to set | | ing, | | the discount rate. | | int) | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code or the | | | | commission code | | | | string list array | | | | | | | | - int: This is the | | | | discount rate | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate(comLi | | | | st,'20'); | | | | | | | | OR | | | | | | | | stp.setDiscRate('IPL | | | | C_OPEN_COMM','20\ | | | | ‘); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayAt(commCo | | This is used to set | | de,payAt) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field | | | | in a transaction with | | | | a commission code. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_DEFE | | | | RRED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | STP.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). The | | | | default value is | | | | STP.CHG_AT_TRAN | | | | SACTION. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayAt('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | _AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setPayBy(comCod | | This is used to set | | e,payBy) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field in a | | | | transaction with a | | | | commission code. The | | | | pararameters are: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_LOC | | | | AL | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | STP.CHG_FOR_FOR | | | | EIGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer). | | | | | | | | *[\ | | | | EXAMPLE]{.underline} | | | | *: | | | | | | | | If the charge is paid | | | | by the ‘Local | | | | Customer’: | | | | | | | | stp.setPayBy('IPLC_ | | | | OPEN_COMM',STP.CHG\ | | | | _FOR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Stp.setAddDOConditi | | This method is used | | on(String | | to prepare the | | xDOPath, String | | domdata for DO during | | tableName, String | | incoming xml | | strFKsParent, String | | processing.the | | strSelFlds, String | | parameters are: | | layerNum, String | | | | doOperateType, String | | - xDOPath: This is | | filterCondition) | | the path of the | | | | relevant DO. | | | | | | | | - tableName: This | | | | is the table | | | | name. | | | | | | | | - strFKsParent: | | | | This is the | | | | Foreign key | | | | relationships | | | | | | | | - strSelFlds: This | | | | is the field | | | | setting to be | | | | retrieved, both | | | | table name and | | | | corresponding | | | | page field name | | | | are required. | | | | Like | | | | pageFldName:table | | | | FldName;pageFldName:t | | | | ableFldName | | | | | | | | - layerNum: This is | | | | the DO layer | | | | number | | | | | | | | - doOperateType: | | | | This is the DO | | | | operate type | | | | | | | | - filterCondition: | | | | This is the | | | | filter condition | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAddDOCondition | | | | ("AdivceForBankCust/ | | | | AdivceForBankCust_ya | | | | oyaotest","STAT_MA | | | | STER","C_MAIN_REF | | | | :C_MAIN_REF;TEAM_N | | | | M:TEAM_NM","LANG_ | | | | CD:LANG_CD;CUST_COR | | | | R_MED:CUST_CORR_ME | | | | D;CNTY_CODE:CNTY_CO | | | | DE","2","A","" | | | | ); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Stp.setDoData() | | This method is used | | | | to prepare the | | | | domdata for DO during | | | | incoming xml | | | | processing. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAddDOCondition | | | | ("AdivceForBankCust/ | | | | AdivceForBankCust_ya | | | | oyaotest","STAT_MA | | | | STER","C_MAIN_REF | | | | :C_MAIN_REF;TEAM_N | | | | M:TEAM_NM","LANG_ | | | | CD:LANG_CD;CUST_COR | | | | R_MED:CUST_CORR_ME | | | | D;CNTY_CODE:CNTY_CO | | | | DE","2","A","" | | | | ); | | | | | | | | stp.setDoData(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Stp.clearDOConditio | | This method is used | | n() | | to prepare the | | | | domdata for DO during | | | | incoming xml | | | | processing. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | stp.setAddDOCondition | | | | ("AdivceForBankCust/ | | | | AdivceForBankCust_ya | | | | oyaotest","STAT_MA | | | | STER","C_MAIN_REF | | | | :C_MAIN_REF;TEAM_N | | | | M:TEAM_NM","LANG_ | | | | CD:LANG_CD;CUST_COR | | | | R_MED:CUST_CORR_ME | | | | D;CNTY_CODE:CNTY_CO | | | | DE","2","A","" | | | | ); | | | | | | | | stp.setDoData(); | | | | | | | | stp.clearDOCondition( | | | | ); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setFunc(String | | This is used for | | funcName) | | setting STP | | | | functions. The | | | | parameter is: | | | | | | | | - String: This is | | | | used to identify | | | | which function is | | | | to be used for | | | | the incoming | | | | message demerging | | | | process. The | | | | function | | | | specified may be | | | | an Add Pending or | | | | Add Master | | | | transaction | | | | function. It may | | | | also be an Edit | | | | Pending or Edit | | | | Master | | | | transaction | | | | function. | | | | | | | | This does not return | | | | any value. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | if(MsgType=="IMLC.00 | | | | 1.ImpLcApplctn") | | | | | | | | { | | | | | | | | stp.setFunc("IPLC_R | | | | eceiveLCFromCE"); | | | | | | | | } | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

#######

####### Function: Variables

Figure 6. Variables for STP Incoming XML – Function

STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED

This is used for retrieving the value of deferred charges.

STP.CHG_AT_FREE

This is used for retrieving the value of the waived charges.

STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION

This is used to retrieve the value of the charge paid at transaction.

STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the foreign customer.

STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the local customer.

STP.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT

This is used to retrieve the business unit level.

STP.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE

This is used to retrieve the comm. level.

STP.LEVEL__COUNTRY

This is used to retrieve the country level.

STP.LEVEL_CUSTOMER

This is used to retrieve the customer level.

STP.LEVEL_STANDARD

This is used to retrieve the standard level.

STP.MAINWITHTRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.SCOPE_MAINREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.TRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a transaction number setting.

Incoming TSU

The following sections list the methods and variables used in the STP settings for incoming TSU messages.

####### Business Unit: Methods

Figure 6. Methods for STP Incoming TSU – Business Unit

Item Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.deleNode(doName | | This is used to | | ,fieldName):void | | delete a field from a | | | | data object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: This | | | | is the field to | | | | be deleted from | | | | the data object. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getSum(doName,f | | This is used to get | | ieldName):String | | the sum of the values | | | | of a field in a data | | | | object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: This | | | | is the field, | | | | from a data | | | | object with | | | | multiple records, | | | | which sum is to | | | | be obtained. | | | | | | | | This returns the sum | | | | of the field values. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getValue(doName | | This method is used | | ,fieldName):String | | to get the value of a | | | | field from a data | | | | object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This | | | | is the name of | | | | the data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: | | | | This is the data | | | | object field | | | | which value is to | | | | be retrieved. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | value of the | | | | indicated DO field. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setValue(doName | | This method is used | | ,fieldName,fieldValue | | to set or assign the | | ):String | | value of a field from | | | | a data object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This | | | | is the name of | | | | the data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: | | | | This is the data | | | | object field | | | | which value is to | | | | be set. | | | | | | | | - fieldValue: | | | | This is the value | | | | to be assigned to | | | | the field. | | | | | | | | This does not | | | | return any value. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.updateFieldValu | | This is used to | | e(doName,fieldName,fi | | update the field of a | | eldValue):void | | data object with a | | | | field value. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This is | | | | the data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: This | | | | is the data | | | | object field | | | | which value is to | | | | be updated. | | | | | | | | - fieldValue: This | | | | is the value to | | | | be assigned to | | | | the field. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | stp.updateFieldValue( | | | | "/root/domData","T | | | | SU_GOODS_DESC",TSU | | | | _GOODS_DESC[0]); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

####### Business Unit: Variables

Figure 6. Variables for STP Incoming TSU – Business Unit

STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED

This is used for retrieving the value of deferred charges.

STP.CHG_AT_FREE

This is used for retrieving the value of the waived charges.

STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION

This is used to retrieve the value of the charge paid at transaction.

STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the foreign customer.

STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the local customer.

STP.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT

This is used to retrieve the business unit level.

STP.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE

This is used to retrieve the comm. level.

STP.LEVEL__COUNTRY

This is used to retrieve the country level.

STP.LEVEL_CUSTOMER

This is used to retrieve the customer level.

STP.LEVEL_STANDARD

This is used to retrieve the standard level.

STP.MAINWITHTRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.SCOPE_MAINREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.TRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a transaction number setting.

#######

####### Function: Methods

Figure 6. Methods for STP Incoming TSU – Function

Method Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.deleNode(doName | | This is used to | | ,fieldName):void | | delete a field from a | | | | data object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | data object. | | | | | | | | fieldName: This is | | | | the field to be | | | | deleted from the data | | | | object. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getSum(doName,f | | This is used to get | | ieldName):String | | the sum of the values | | | | of a field in a data | | | | object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: This | | | | is the field, | | | | from a data | | | | object with | | | | multiple records, | | | | which sum is to | | | | be obtained. | | | | | | | | This returns the sum | | | | of the field values. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.getValue(doName | | This method is used | | ,fieldName):String | | to get the value of a | | | | field from a data | | | | object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This | | | | is the name of | | | | the data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: | | | | This is the data | | | | object field | | | | which value is to | | | | be retrieved. | | | | | | | | This returns the | | | | value of the | | | | indicated DO field. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.setValue(doName | | This method is used | | ,fieldName,fieldValue | | to set or assign the | | ):String | | value of a field from | | | | a data object. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This | | | | is the name of | | | | the data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: | | | | This is the data | | | | object field | | | | which value is to | | | | be set. | | | | | | | | - fieldValue: | | | | This is the value | | | | to be assigned to | | | | the field. | | | | | | | | This does not | | | | return any value. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | stp.updateFieldValu | | This is used to | | e(doName,fieldName,fi | | update the field of a | | eldValue):void | | data object with a | | | | field value. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - doName: This is | | | | the data object. | | | | | | | | - fieldName: This | | | | is the data | | | | object field | | | | which value is to | | | | be updated. | | | | | | | | - fieldValue: This | | | | is the value to | | | | be assigned to | | | | the field. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | stp.updateFieldValue( | | | | "/root/domData","T | | | | SU_GOODS_DESC",TSU | | | | _GOODS_DESC[0]); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

####### Function: Variables

Figure 6. Variables for STP Incoming TSU - Function

STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED

This is used for retrieving the value of deferred charges.

STP.CHG_AT_FREE

This is used for retrieving the value of the waived charges.

STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION

This is used to retrieve the value of the charge paid at transaction.

STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the foreign customer.

STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL

This is used to retrieve the value of charges to be paid by the local customer.

STP.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT

This is used to retrieve the business unit level.

STP.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE

This is used to retrieve the comm. level.

STP.LEVEL__COUNTRY

This is used to retrieve the country level.

STP.LEVEL_CUSTOMER

This is used to retrieve the customer level.

STP.LEVEL_STANDARD

This is used to retrieve the standard level.

STP.MAINWITHTRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.SCOPE_MAINREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a reference number setting.

STP.TRXREF

This is used to retrieve the reference name of a transaction number setting.

{#section-15 .CS-head2}

SWIFT Function

The system methods for the SWIFT Tag Rule are as follows.

Figure 6. System Methods for the SWIFT Message Tag Rule

DV.SYS_getCUBK(String,String)

This is used to get the field value from a predefined transaction table using the Get CUBK rule. The field value that is returned is placed in the memory. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the Get CUBK mapping rule name.

  • String 2: This is the key field name of the Get CUBK rule.

This returns the field value that is selected from the database according to the Get CUBK rule.

DV.SYS_getTableData(String,String,String)

This method is used to get the table field values from the server side. **Parameters: **

  • String 1: This is the name of the table to be queried.

  • String 2: This is the query condition to be used.

  • String 3: This is the field list to be queried.

This returns an array of records resulting from the query.

**DV.SYS_getTableDataValue(String, String, String) **

This method is currently not used for the SWIFT function.

DV.appendBarcode(formName, barcode, custid, birtbarcodeMappingField)

This method is used to add a barcode to a generated document. The barcode is generated based on the values of the relevant fields from the transaction screen. Parameters:

  • formName: This is the name of the BIRT Form rule.

  • barcode: This refers to a fixed value to be used for the generation of the barcode if the field defined as the birtbarcodeMappingField has no value. This parameter is optional.

  • custid: This is the Customer Id field. The value here must be retrieved from the available variables and not from the mapping fields. This parameter is optional.

  • birtbarcodeMappingfield: This is the field on which the generation of the barcode is based.

DV.appendBarcode(formName, barcode, custid, birtbarcodeMappingField, doXpath)

This method is used to add a barcode to a generated document. The barcode is generated based on the values that are retrieved from a data object. Parameters:

  • formName: This is the name of the BIRT Form rule.

  • barcode: This refers to a fixed value to be used for the generation of the barcode if the field defined as the birtbarcodeMappingField has no value. This parameter is optional.

  • custid: This is the Customer Id field. The value here must be retrieved from the available variables and not from the mapping fields. This parameter is optional.

  • birtbarcodeMappingField: This is the field on which the generation of the barcode is based.

  • doXpath: This is the name of the data object where the barcode mapping field is located.

DV.appendBarcode(formName, barcode, custid, birtbarcodeMappingField, doXpath, condition)

This method is used to add a barcode to a generated document. The barcode is generated based on the values that are retrieved from a data object provided that the specified condition is met. Parameters:

  • formName: This is the name of the BIRT Form rule.

  • barcode: This refers to a fixed value to be used for the generation of the barcode if the field defined as the birtbarcodeMappingField has no value. This parameter is optional.

  • custid: This is the Customer Id field. The value here must be retrieved from the available variables and not from the mapping fields. This parameter is optional.

  • birtbarcodeMappingField: This is the field on which the generation of the barcode is based.

  • doXpath: This is the name of the data object where the barcode mapping field is located.

  • condition: This is the condition for generating the barcode.

DV.appendDOSWIFT(String,String)

This method is used to apply the outward SWIFT message rule in the data object. Parameter:

  • String: This is the outgoing SWIFT message rule.

  • String: This is the condition for retrieving the DO data.

[EXAMPLE: ]{.underline}

if(MESG_TYPE_BANK.substr(0,2) == 'MT' && type!='D'){

if(sResult == "TRUE" || sMT == "999"){

DV.appendDOSWIFT('SSSS_sendtobank_sw_mt' + MESG_TYPE_BANK.substr(2,3),"MESG_TYPE_BANK = '" + MESG_TYPE_BANK + "'");

DV.appendField(String)

This is used to attach a SWIFT message rule to the transaction function. Parameter:

  • String: This is the SWIFT message rule.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

if(sResult_705 == "TRUE"){

DV.appendSWIFT("EPLC_SWIFT_MT705 ");

DV.appendField(String, boolean)

This method is currently not used for the SWIFT function.

DV.appendField(String,String,String)

This is used to attach a SWIFT message rule to the transaction function. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the SWIFT message rule to be attached to the transaction function.

  • String 2: This is the data object that serves as the source for the condition indicated in String 3.

  • String3: This is the condition for attaching the SWIFT message rule to the transaction function.

DV.appendFieldGroup()

This method is currently not used for the SWIFT function.

DV.appendGroupField(ruleName,xPath,fieldName)

This method is currently not used for the SWIFT function.

DV.appendInternalSWIFT(String)

This is used to apply an outward SWIFT Message rule that is defined in the SWIFT Config function (SWIFT Message tab) for the transaction module. The SWIFT messages that are generated with this internal SWIFT are not sent to the SWIFT Alliance. Instead, the message is sent to a recipient through an internal route that is provided by the EE system through a third party. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the Outgoing SWIFT Message rule.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

if (SEND_ACK == ‘YES’){

DV.appendInternalSWIFT(‘MT100’);

}

DV.appendInternalTSU(String,String)

This is used to apply a TSU message mapping rule defined in a outgoing TSU message function. Parameter:

  • String: This is the TSU message mapping rule.

  • String: This is the TSU version.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

DV.appendInternalTSU("tsmt.012.001.03","R2")

DV.appendSWIFT(String)

This is used to apply an outward SWIFT Message rule that is defined in the SWIFT Config (SWIFT Message tab) for the transaction module. The outward SWIFT message that is generated using this method is sent out to the SWIFT Alliance or Merva device according to the parameters that are defined in the SWIFT Send Setting. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the outward SWIFT Message rule.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

if(ADV_BK_CORR_MED=='SWIFT' && tag79 !='')

{

DV.appendSWIFT("MT999_AmdLC ");

}

DV.appendTag(String);

This determines whether a SWIFT Tag should appear in an outward SWIFT message. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the Tag Code that is to appear in the SWIFT output message based on the rule that is defined in the SWIFT Message Tag Rule. When merging SWIFT message, the system checks against the Tag rule where the DV.appendTag() method is used. If this meets the condition that is defined in the Tag Rule, the defined Tag is displayed in the SWIFT output message. If, on the other hand, it does meet the rule condition, the Tag does not appear in the message even if the mapping field contains a valid value in the transaction.

This does not return any value.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var FieldA = DV.getFieldValue(FieldA);

var FieldB = DV.getFieldValue(FieldB);

if (FieldA !='' && FieldB !='' ) {

DV.appendTag('57A');

}

DV.calDate(String,int);

This method is used to calculate a new date from a given date +/- a given number of days.

  • String: This is the date in string format.

  • int: This is the number of days to be added or subtracted from the given date.

This returns a String.

DV.checkRMA()

This is used to invoke the SWIFT RMA service’s checking process.

DV.day1MustbeLaterThanDay2(String strFirstDay, String strSecondDay)

This method is used to check that the first Date field value is later than the second Date field value. Parameters:

  • strFirstDay: This is the first date.

  • strSecondDay: This is the second date.

This returns a Boolean.

DV.getDOValue(Element,String)

This method is used for getting the value of a field from a data object. Parameter:

  • Element: This can be the name of the data object, or a specific record in the data object.

  • String: This is the data object field which value is to be retrieved.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

for(var i = 0;i < records.length;i++){

MESG_TYPE_BANK = DV.getDOValue(records[i],"MESG_TYPE_BANK");

type = DV.getNodeAttr(records[i], "Type");

DV.getFieldValue(String);

This is used to get the value of a specified field. Parameter:

  • String: This is the transaction field name.

The system returns the value of the specified field.

DV.getLineValue(String,int);

This method is used to return a line or a sub-text from a line, beginning from the defined from the position number. Parameters:

  • String: This is the string from which the sub-text is to be retrieved.

  • int: This is the position within the line where the system starts retrieving the text.

This returns a String.

DV.getPartValue(String,int,int);

This method is used to get a particular part of a field value with a specified starting position and a defined data length. Parameters:

  • String: This is the source of the sub-text to be retrieved.

  • Int 1: This is the start position.

  • Int 2: This is the number of characters to get.

This returns a String.

DV.getRecord(String,String)

This method is used for retrieving a data object record based on a defined condition. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the name of the data object.

  • String 2: This is the condition for retrieving the record.

DV.getRecords(String)

This method is used to retrieve the records of a data object. Parameter:

  • String: This is the name of the data object. This can be an xPath.

This returns an array of records.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var records = DV.getRecords("AdivceForBankCust");

DV.getSubDays(strFirstDay,strSecondDay,strCntyCode,strSubCntyCode,isGetWorkDay)

This method is used to get the number of days between two specified dates. Parameters:

  • strFirstDay: This is the first date.

  • strSecondDay: This is the second date.

  • strCntyCode: This is the country code.

  • strSubCntyCode: This is the sub-country code.

  • isGetWorkDay: This flag setting indicates whether or not to include the working days in the calculation.

This returns an Integer.

DV.getSysBusiDate();

This method is used to get the system business date.

DV.getSysDate();

This method is used to get the system date.

DV.getUpdatedData()

This method is used to updatethe DOM data for the current transaction. This is used with the stp.updateFieldValue system method.

DV.setDOValue(String,String,String)

This method is used to set or assign the value of a data object field. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the element of the data object**.**

  • String 2: This is the field of the data object which value is to be set.

  • String 3: This is the value to be assigned to the field.

DV.setVoucherGapiRule(String GapiRuleName)

This is used to set the GAPI rule to be used when the voucher is generated.

  • String GapiRuleName: This the name of the GAPI rule.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

DV.setVoucherGapiRule(" IMLC_EEOUT");

DV.toDouble(String);

This is used to convert the value of a string into a Double data type. Parameter:

  • String: This may be any numeric string value.

This returns a Double value that is converted from the specified string value.

DV.toFloat(String);

This method is used to convert the value of a string into a Float data type. Parameter:

  • String: This is the numeric data to be converted into a Float data type.

This returns a Float data type.

DV.toInteger(String);

This method is used to convert a value of a string to an Integer data type. Parameter:

  • String: This is the numeric data to be converted into the Integer data type.

This returns an Integer.

DV.updateField(String, String)

This is used to update the field with a field value. Parameters:

  • String: This is the transaction field name which value is to be updated.

  • String: This is the value to be assigned to the field.

This does not return any value.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

stp.updateFieldValue('REMIT_BKID','CHASUS33XXX');

[NOTE]{.underline}: This updates the REMIT_BKID field with the new value ‘CHASUS33XXX’.

DV.writeLog(String);

This method is used to write log information for user notification or debugging in the EE log file.

Parameter:

  • String: This is the text to be written into the log file.

This does not return any value.

Transaction Function Components

The following sections list the methods used in setting up the components of a transaction function.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: An xPath pertains to the complete path of the data object element in the data object hierarchy. This data object element can be the data object element itself or a child template. Refer to the following examples.

+———————————————————————–+ | Examples of xPath Values | | | | i. To determine the value of Field1: | | | | - Data object – TestDataObject (This is a DO with a template root | | node.) | | | | - DOTemplate – This is the corresponding template of the DO | | | | - DOTemplate has 3 child templates: DOTemplateA, DOTemplateB, | | DOTemplateC. | | | | - If Field1 is in DOTemplateC, the xPath is: | | TestDataObject.DOTemplateC. | | | | ii. To determine the value of Field1: | | | | - Data object – TestDataObject (This is a DO with a template root | | node) | | | | - DOTemplate – This is the corresponding template of the DO | | | | - DOTemplate has 3 child templates: DOTemplateA, DOTemplateB, | | DOTemplateC. | | | | - DOTemplateC has 2 child templates: DOTemplateC1 and DOTemplateC2. | | | | - If Field1 is in DOTemplateC2, the xPath is: | | TestDataObject.DOTemplateC.DOTemplateC2 | | | | iii. To determine the value of Field1: | | | | - Data object – Test2DataObject (This is a DO with a none-template | | root node) | | | | - Test2DataObject has 3 child templates, all at the same level: | | Template1, Template2, Template3 | | | | - If Field1 is in Template3, the xPath is: | | Test2DataObject.Template3 | +———————————————————————–+

Transfer To

The system methods for the Transfer To transaction function component are as follows.

Figure 6. System Methods for Transaction Function – Transfer To

appendFieldByDateCompare(fieldValue, doXpath, sCondition, trxDomNodeName, domDataNodeName, operator)

This method is used to attach a rule to the transaction function by conditions. Parameters:

  • fieldValue: This is the rule to be attached to the transaction function.

  • doXpath: This is the data object that serves as the source for the condition indicated in the third parameter.

  • sCondition: This is the condition for attaching the rule to the transaction function

  • trxDomNodeName: This is the date field in the main page.

  • domDataNodeName: This is the date field in the DO.

  • operator: This is the operator used to compare above two date fields, it must be used as this order: trxDomNodeName operator domDataNodeName.

DV.SYS_getCUBK(String,String)

This is used to get the field value from a predefined transaction table using the Get CUBK rule. The field value that is returned is placed in the memory. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the Get CUBK mapping rule name.

  • String 2: This is the key field name of the Get CUBK rule.

This returns the field value that is selected from the database according to the Get CUBK rule.

DV.SYS_getTableData(String,String,String)

This method is used to get the table field values from the server side. **Parameters: **

  • String 1: This is the name of the table to be queried.

  • String 2: This is the query condition to be used.

  • String 3: This is the field list to be queried.

This returns an array of records resulting from the query.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

DV.appendField("IssueLCAmd_toMaster");

DV.SYS_getTableDataValue(String, String, String)

This is used to retrieve the field value from the database. Parameters:

  • String: This pertains to the field list. If there are two columns defined, the system only retrieves the value of the first column.

  • String: This is the table name to be queried.

  • String: This is the condition list.

DV.appendBarcode(formName, barcode, custid, birtbarcodeMappingField)

This method is used to add a barcode to a generated document. The barcode is generated based on the values of the relevant fields from the transaction screen. Parameters:

  • formName: This is the name of the BIRT Form rule.

  • barcode: This refers to a fixed value to be used for the generation of the barcode if the field defined as the birtbarcodeMappingField has no value. This parameter is optional.

  • custid: This is the Customer Id field. The value here must be retrieved from the available variables and not from the mapping fields. This parameter is optional.

  • birtbarcodeMappingfield: This is the field on which the generation of the barcode is based.

DV.appendBarcode(formName, barcode, custid, birtbarcodeMappingField, doXpath)

This method is used to add a barcode to a generated document. The barcode is generated based on the values that are retrieved from a data object. Parameters:

  • formName: This is the name of the BIRT Form rule.

  • barcode: This refers to a fixed value to be used for the generation of the barcode if the field defined as the birtbarcodeMappingField has no value. This parameter is optional.

  • custid: This is the Customer Id field. The value here must be retrieved from the available variables and not from the mapping fields. This parameter is optional.

  • birtbarcodeMappingField: This is the field on which the generation of the barcode is based.

  • doXpath: This is the name of the data object where the barcode mapping field is located.

DV.appendBarcode(formName, barcode, custid, birtbarcodeMappingField, doXpath, condition)

This method is used to add a barcode to a generated document. The barcode is generated based on the values that are retrieved from a data object provided that the specified condition is met. Parameters:

  • formName: This is the name of the BIRT Form rule.

  • barcode: This refers to a fixed value to be used for the generation of the barcode if the field defined as the birtbarcodeMappingField has no value. This parameter is optional.

  • custid: This is the Customer Id field. The value here must be retrieved from the available variables and not from the mapping fields. This parameter is optional.

  • birtbarcodeMappingField: This is the field on which the generation of the barcode is based.

  • doXpath: This is the name of the data object where the barcode mapping field is located.

  • condition: This is the condition for generating the barcode.

DV.appendDOSWIFT(String,String)

This method is used to apply the outward SWIFT message rule in the data object. Parameter:

  • String: This is the outgoing SWIFT message rule.

  • String: This is the condition for retrieving the DO data.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

if(MESG_TYPE_BANK.substr(0,2) == 'MT' && type!='D'){

if(sResult == "TRUE" || sMT == "999"){

DV.appendDOSWIFT('SSSS_sendtobank_sw_mt' + MESG_TYPE_BANK.substr(2,3),"MESG_TYPE_BANK = '" + MESG_TYPE_BANK + "'");

DV.appendField(String)

This is used to attach a Transfer To rule to the transaction function. Parameter:

  • String: This is the Transfer To rule.

DV.appendField(String, boolean)

This method is currently not used for the Transfer To transaction function component.

DV.appendField(String,String,String)

This is used to attach a Transfer To rule to the transaction function. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the Transfer To to be attached to the transaction function.

  • String 2: This is the data object that serves as the source for the condition indicated in String 3.

  • String3: This is the condition for attaching the Transfer To rule to the transaction function.

DV.appendFieldGroup()

This method is currently not used for the Transfer To transaction function component.

DV.appendGroupField(ruleName,xPath,fieldName)

This method is currently not used for the Transfer To transaction function component.

DV.appendInternalSWIFT(String)

This is used to apply an outward SWIFT Message rule that is defined in the SWIFT Config function (SWIFT Message tab) for the transaction module. The SWIFT messages that are generated with this internal SWIFT are not sent to the SWIFT Alliance. Instead, the message is sent to a recipient through an internal route that is provided by the EE system through a third party. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the Outgoing SWIFT Message rule.

DV.appendInternalTSU(String,String)

This is used to apply a TSU message mapping rule defined in a outgoing TSU message function. Parameter:

  • String: This is the TSU message mapping rule.

  • String: This is the TSU version.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

DV.appendInternalTSU("tsmt.012.001.03","R2")

DV.appendSWIFT(String)

This is used to apply an outward SWIFT Message rule that is defined in the SWIFT Config (SWIFT Message tab) for the transaction module. The outward SWIFT message that is generated using this method is sent out to the SWIFT Alliance or Merva device according to the parameters that are defined in the SWIFT Send Setting. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the outward SWIFT Message rule.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

if(ADV_BK_CORR_MED=='SWIFT' && tag79 !='')

{

DV.appendSWIFT("MT999_AmdLC ");

}

DV.appendTag(String)

This determines whether a SWIFT Tag should appear in an outward SWIFT message. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the Tag Code that is to appear in the SWIFT output message based on the rule that is defined in the SWIFT Message Tag Rule. When merging SWIFT message, the system checks against the Tag rule where the DV.appendTag() method is used. If this meets the condition that is defined in the Tag Rule, the defined Tag is displayed in the SWIFT output message. If, on the other hand, it does meet the rule condition, the Tag does not appear in the message even if the mapping field contains a valid value in the transaction.

This does not return any value.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var FieldA = DV.getFieldValue(FieldA);

var FieldB = DV.getFieldValue(FieldB);

if (FieldA !='' && FieldB !='' ) {

DV.appendTag('57A');

}

DV.calDate(String,int)

This method is used to calculate a new date from a given date +/- a given number of days.

  • String: This is the date in string format.

  • int: This is the number of days to be added or subtracted from the given date.

This returns a String.

DV.checkRMA()

This is used to invoke the SWIFT RMA service’s checking process.

DV.day1MustbeLaterThanDay2(String strFirstDay, String strSecondDay)

This method is used to check that the first Date field value is later than the second Date field value. Parameters:

  • strFirstDay: This is the first date.

  • strSecondDay: This is the second date.

This returns a Boolean.

DV.getDOValue(Element,String)

This method is used for getting the value of a field from a data object. Parameter:

  • Element: This can be the name of the data object, or a specific record in the data object.

  • String: This is the data object field which value is to be retrieved.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

for(var i = 0;i < records.length;i++){

MESG_TYPE_BANK = DV.getDOValue(records[i],"MESG_TYPE_BANK");

type = DV.getNodeAttr(records[i], "Type");

DV.getFieldValue(String)

This is used to get the value of a specified field. Parameter:

  • String: This is the transaction field name.

The system returns the value of the specified field.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var DETRMNTL_FLG = DV.getFieldValue("DETRMNTL_FLG");

if(DETRMNTL_FLG =='No')

{

DV.appendField("IssueLCAmd_toMaster");

}

DV.getLineValue(String,int)

This method is used to return a line or a sub-text from a line, beginning from the defined from the position number. Parameters:

  • String: This is the string from which the sub-text is to be retrieved.

  • int: This is the position within the line where the system starts retrieving the text.

This returns a String.

DV.getPartValue(String,int,int)

This method is used to get a particular part of a field value with a specified starting position and a defined data length. Parameters:

  • String: This is the source of the sub-text to be retrieved.

  • Int 1: This is the start position.

  • Int 2: This is the number of characters to get.

This returns a String.

DV.getRecord(String,String)

This method is used for retrieving a data object record based on a defined condition. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the name of the data object.

  • String 2: This is the condition for retrieving the record.

DV.getRecords(String)

This method is used to retrieve the records of a data object. Parameter:

  • String: This is the name of the data object. This can be an xPath.

This returns an array of records.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var records = DV.getRecords("AdivceForBankCust");

DV.getSubDays(strFirstDay,strSecondDay,strCntyCode,strSubCntyCode,isGetWorkDay)

This method is used to get the number of days between two specified dates. Parameters:

  • strFirstDay: This is the first date.

  • strSecondDay: This is the second date.

  • strCntyCode: This is the country code.

  • strSubCntyCode: This is the sub-country code.

  • isGetWorkDay: This flag setting indicates whether or not to include the working days in the calculation.

This returns an Integer.

DV.getSysBusiDate()

This method is used to get the system business date.

DV.getSysDate()

This method is used to get the system date.

DV.getUpdatedData()

This method is used to updatethe DOM data for the current transaction. This is used with the stp.updateFieldValue system method.

DV.setDOValue(String,String,String)

This method is used to set or assign the value of a data object field. Parameters:

  • String 1: This is the element of the data object**.**

  • String 2: This is the field of the data object which value is to be set.

  • String 3: This is the value to be assigned to the field.

DV.setVoucherGapiRule(String GapiRuleName)

This is used to set the GAPI rule to be used when the voucher is generated.

  • String GapiRuleName: This the name of the GAPI rule.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

DV.setVoucherGapiRule(" IMLC_EEOUT");

DV.toDouble(String)

This is used to convert the value of a string into a Double data type. Parameter:

  • String: This may be any numeric string value.

This returns a Double value that is converted from the specified string value.

DV.toFloat(String)

This method is used to convert the value of a string into a Float data type. Parameter:

  • String: This is the numeric data to be converted into a Float data type.

This returns a Float data type.

DV.toInteger(String)

This method is used to convert a value of a string to an Integer data type. Parameter:

  • String: This is the numeric data to be converted into the Integer data type.

This returns an Integer.

DV.updateField(String,String)

This is used to update the field with a field value. Parameters:

  • String: This is the transaction field name which value is to be updated.

  • String: This is the value to be assigned to the field.

This does not return any value.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

stp.updateFieldValue('REMIT_BKID','CHASUS33XXX');

[NOTE]{.underline}: This updates the REMIT_BKID field with the new value ‘CHASUS33XXX’.

DV.writeLog(String)

This method is used to write log information for user notification or debugging in the EE log file. Parameter:

  • String: This is the text to be written into the log file.

This does not return any value.

{#section-16 .CS-head2}

Incoming SWIFT

The system methods for the Incoming SWIFT transaction function component are as follows.

Figure 6. System Methods for Transaction Function – Incoming SWIFT

stp.SYS_GetExchangeRate(String fromCCY, String toCCY, String rateType)

Similar to the DV.SYS_GetExchangeRate() method, this is used to retrieve the exchange rate value. Parameters:

  • String fromCCY: This is the From CCY value.

  • String toCCY: This is the To CCY value.

  • String rateType: This is the rate type value.

stp.SYS_GetExchangeRate(String fromCCY,String toCCY,String rateType,String fieldName):void

Similar to the DV.SYS_GetExchangeRate() method, this is used to retrieve the exchange rate value. Parameters:

  • String fromCCY: This is the From CCY value.

  • String toCCY: This is the To CCY value.

  • String rateType: This is the rate type value.

  • String fieldName: This is the field that gets the exchange rate value.

stp.SYS_InsertClause(String fieldName,String clauseName,boolean bAppend):void

This is used to append, insert, or update a specified clause text to a transaction field automatically through the STP setting. Parameters:

  • String fieldName: This is the name of the clause field. The field that is specified is used to get the clause value.

  • String clauseName: This is the clause template name. The template that is specified must be one of the clause templates that have been assigned to the field through the Clause function in the EE Utility.

  • Boolean: This may be set as either True or False. Setting this to True instructs the system to insert the selected clause content to the specified field without removing the original field value, if there is an original value. Setting this field to False, on the other hand, instructs the system to update or replace the initial field value with the specified clause content.

This does not return any value.

stp.SYS_getDataExt(String mappingName, String keyFieldName,String condition)

This is used to retrieve data using the getCUBK rule. Parameters:

  • String mappingName: This is the Get CUBK mapping rule name.

  • String keyFieldName: This is the key field name of the Get CUBK rule.

  • String condition: This pertains to the condition for retrieving the value of the GetCUBK.

stp.SYS_getRefNo(String refName):String

This is used to get the transaction reference number. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the reference number rule defined in the browser Standing Data module.

This returns the C_MAIN_REF value.

stp.addDORec(String doXpath,String sCondition,DataObjectFields fields)

This method is used for adding a record to a data object based on a given condition. Parameters:

  • String doXPath: This is the xPath of the data object.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for adding a record to the data object.

  • DataObjectFields field: These are the fields which which may be added to the data object depending on the condition.

stp.addField(DataObjectFields fields,String name,String value)

This method is used to add the information from a data object to specific fields. Parameters:

  • DataObjectFields: This is the DO fields and their values.

  • String 1: This is the name of the field that is to get the value of the data object.

  • String 2: This is the field value.

stp.addFieldList(ServerDataInfo sdi, String fieldName)

This is used to append the fields to an SQL query. These are the fields that are to be selected from a table in the database. This method is normally used together with other methods such as stp.addSQLCondition() and stp.executeQuery() in order to get the expected field value. Parameters:

  • ServerDataInfo sdi: This is the field list. When it is to add the first field in the field list, a null value should be provided.

  • String fieldName: This is the field name that is to be included in the field list.

This does not return any value.

[EXAMPLE 1:]{.underline}

var fid_list1 = stp.addFieldList(null,"C_MAIN_REF");

var sql_cond1 = stp.addSQLCondition(null,"DRAWING_REF",tag21);

var result1 = stp.executeQuery("EXIMTRX.EPLC_EM_NEGO",fid_list1,sql_cond1);

var c_main = stp.getDBFieldValue(result1,"C_MAIN_REF");

[NOTE]{.underline}: In reading the field list, the system ignores these characters:

  • (, if it precedes the field name; and

  • ), if it follows the field name.

stp.addSQLCondition(ServerDataInfo sdi, String fieldName,String fieldValue)

This is used to append the fields that compose the SQL select condition. Parameters:

  • ServerDataInfo sdi: This is the SQL condition list. If it is used as a condition for the first field, a null value should be provided.

  • String fieldName: This is the field used in the SQL Where condition.

  • String fieldValue: This is placed as the value of the field that is defined in String fieldName.

This does not return any value.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var sql_cond = stp.addSQLCondition(null,"C_MAIN_REF",TAG21);

var result = stp.executeQuery("EXIMTRX.EPLC_MASTER",fid_list,sql_cond);

var cls_flg = stp.getDBFieldValue(result,"CLS_FLG");

stp.addTrxCharge(comCode)

This method is used to add a charge with a commission code. Parameters:

  • comCode: This is the commission code list array or commission code string defined in the standing module

This returns a transaction charge object.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

To add a Letter of Credit Issue Commission

var comList = 'IPLC_OPEN_COMM,EPLC_POST_CHG';

var trxChg = stp.addTrxCharge(comList);

or

var comList = ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM'];

stp.addTrxCharge(comList);

stp.calDate(String fieldValue, int days)

This method is used to calculate a new date from a given date +/- a given number of days. Parameters:

  • String fieldValue: This is the date in string format

  • Int days: This is the number of days to be added or subtracted from the given date.

This returns a String.

stp.calEndWorkingDate(String strCntyCodeValue,String strStartDateValue, String strDaysValue,String strBeforeOrAfter, String strIfCheckHol, String strIfJumpHol)

This method is used to get the end working date based on the start date and the number of days to add or subtract. Parameters:

  • strCntyCode: This is the country code.

  • strStartDate: This is the starting date.

  • strDaysValue: This is the number of days.

  • strBeforeOrAfter: This is the Before or After flag setting. The possible values are A, the default value, and B.

  • strIfCheckHol: This flag setting indicates whether or not to check holiday dates. The possible values are Y, the default value, and N.

  • strIfJumpHol: This flag setting indicates whether or not to include the holiday dates in the calculation. The possible values are N, the default value, and Y.

This returns the date.

stp.calNumberOfTerms(String startDate, String endDate, int termPeriod):int

This method is used to calculate number of terms from the start date to the end date. The term may be monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually.

Parameters:

  • String startDate: This is the start date.

  • String endDate: This is the end date.

  • Int termPeriod: This is the term period.

This returns an Integer.

stp.calculate(commListArr, calPara)

This method is used to calculate charges. Parameters:

  • commListArr: This is the commission code list array. The array follows this order: Commission Code1, Commission Code 2.
  • calPara: This is the parameter string array, which may contain the following variables.

  • trxCcy is the currency of the transaction.

  • amount is the amount involved in the transaction.

  • sDate is the start date of the transaction.

  • eDate is the end date of the transaction.

  • from is the location of the sender of the express fee.

  • to is the location of the recipient of the express fee.

  • baseDay is the base number of days used in the calculation of interests.

  • plusTimes is the number of times the charges are to be calculated.

  • extendFldsArr allows the values of the fields to be stored, making these fields reusable.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var parameter = ['USD','100000','2011-3-23','2011-4-23','US','CN','360','null',null];

var comList = ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM',’ EPLC_POST_CHG’];

var result = stp.calculate(comList,parameter);

stp.cancelSepTrx(String string)

This method is used for special projects only.

stp.cancelTrx(String )

This method is used to cancel an STP transaction and send an error information parameter. Parameter:

  • String: This is the error parameter.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

if (cls_flg =="YES"){

stp.cancelTrx("The close flag is yes");

}

stp.capureDefChargesByScope()

This method is used to retrieve the deferred charges according to the condition defined in the stp.setDefChargeScope() system method.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.setDefChargeScope(STP.SCOPE_MAINREF);

stp.capureDefChargesByScope()

stp.checkHoliday(String strDate, String strSubCntyCode)

This method is used to check whether or not a given date is a holiday. Parameter:

  • String StrDate: This is the date to be verified as a holiday.

  • String strSubCntyCode: This is the sub-country code.

This returns a Boolean.

stp.compareString(String firstValue,String doubleValue)

This is used to compare two strings with different values. Parameters:

  • String firstValue: This is the first string.

  • String doubleValue: This is the second string with a different string value.

stp.confirmCharge()

This is used to confirm all charges and calculate the charges in the application server.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.confirmCharge();

stp.delDORec(String doName,String sCondition)

This method is used to delete a record from a data object according to a defined condition. Parameters:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object. This can be an xPath.

  • sCondition: This is the condition for deleting the String record. The format is similar to an SQL statement.

This returns a Boolean.

stp.deleNode(String doName,String fieldName)

This is used to delete a field from a data object. Parameters:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String fieldName: This is the field to be deleted from the data object.

stp.executeQuery(String tableName, ServerDataInfo fldList,ServerDataInfo sqlCondition)

This is used to execute an SQL query with user-defined conditions. Parameters:

  • String tableName: This is the table name.

  • ServerDataInfo fldList: This is the field list.

  • ServerDataInfo sqlCondition: This is the query condition.

This returns the value of the fields that are defined in the field list

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var sql_cond = stp.addSQLCondition(null,"C_MAIN_REF",TAG21);

var result = stp.executeQuery("EXIMTRX.EPLC_MASTER",fid_list,sql_cond);

var cls_flg = stp.getDBFieldValue(result,"CLS_FLG");

[NOTE]{.underline}: In reading the field list, the system ignores these characters:

  • (, if it precedes the field name; and

  • ), if it follows the field name.

stp.getBankGroupId()

This method is used for retrieving the ID of the current bank group.

stp.getBkKey()

This is used to get the value of a field from the table.

stp.getBkTabl()

This is used to set the value of a field from the table.

stp.getBusiUnit()

This is used to get the transaction business unit code of the incoming SWIFT.

stp.getDBFieldValue(HashMap hmResult, String fieldName)

This method is used to get the field value from an object parameter. Parameters:

  • HashMap hmResult: his is the object parameter which value is retrieved from the database and assigned to a field.

  • String fieldName: This is the field that is assigned with the value obtained from the database.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var sql_cond = stp.addSQLCondition(null,"C_MAIN_REF",TAG21);

var result = stp.executeQuery("EXIMTRX.EPLC_MASTER",fid_list,sql_cond);

var cls_flg = stp.getDBFieldValue(result,"CLS_FLG");

stp.getDORecCount(String eDo,String sCondition)

This method is used to count the number of records in a data object that satisfies the defined condition. Parameters:

  • String eDO: This is the name of the data object. This can be an xPath.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for including the record in the record count. The format is similar to an SQL statement.

This returns an Integer.

stp.getDOValue(Element eDo,String fieldName)

This method is used for getting the value of a field from a data object. Parameters:

  • Element eDO: This is the name of the data object.

  • String fieldName: This is the data object field which value is to be retrieved.

stp.getDomDataNodeValue(String nodeName)

This method is used to get the value of the node name from the data object. Parameters:

  • String nodeName: This is the node in the XML file

stp.getFieldSumByDoName(String fieldname, String doxPath,String sCondition)

This method is used to get the sum of the values of a field in a data object according to the data object’s name and a defined condition. This name must be unique among the elements of the given data object (i.e., data object tree).

Parameters:

  • String fieldname: This is the field, from a data object with multiple records, which sum is to be obtained.

  • String doxPath: T his pertains to the xPath of the data object.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for including the field value in the sum to be calculated. The format is similar to an SQL statement.

This returns the sum of the values of the given field.

stp.getFieldSumByXpath(String fieldname, String doxPath,String sCondition)

This method is used to get the sum of the values of a field in a data object according to the data object’s xPath and a defined condition. Parameters:

  • String fieldname: This is the field, from a data object with multiple records, which sum is to be obtained.

  • String doxPath: This is the xPath of the data object.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for including the field value in the sum to be calculated. The format is similar to an SQL statement.

This returns a String, which contains the sum of the values of the given field.

stp.getFieldValue(String fieldName)

This is used to get the value of the field. Parameter:

  • String fieldName: This is the field name.

This returns the value of the specified field.

stp.getForeignBalTotalAmt(ccy)

This is used to get the total balance amount of the foreign customer. Parameters:

  • ccy: This is the currency in which the resulting balance is to be returned

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var balAmtLocal = stp.getForeignBalTotalAmt("USD");

stp.getForeignTotalCollectAmt()

This is used to get the total amount, including the charge amount and VAT amount, collected from the foreign customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var forTotalCollAmt = stp.getForeignTotalCollectAmt();

stp.getForeignTotalCollectCharge()

This is used to get the total amount of bank charges collected from the foreign customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var forTotalCollChg = stp.getForeignTotalCollectCharge();

stp.getForeignTotalCollectVAT()

This is used to get the total VAT amount collected from the foreign customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var forTotalCollVAT = stp.getForeignTotalCollectVAT();

stp.getForeignTotalPayAmt()

This is used to get the total amount paid by the foreign customer, including the charge payment and VAT payment amounts.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var forTotalPayAmt = stp.getForeignTotalPayAmt();

stp.getForeignTotalPayCharge()

This is used to get the total amount of bank charges paid by the foreign customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var forTotalPayCharges = stp.getForeignTotalPayCharge();

stp.getForeignTotalPayVAT()

This is used to get the total VAT amount paid by the foreign customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var forTotalPayVAT = stp.getForeignTotalPayVAT();

stp.getGrpDataByFldNm(String fieldname,String doName,String sCondition)

This method is used to retrieve all the values of a field in a data object according to a defined condition. The data object name must be unique among the elements of the given data object (i.e., data object tree). Parameters:

  • String fieldname: This is the field, from a data object with multiple records, which values are to be obtained.

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for determining the records that includes the field values to be retrieved.

This returns a String, which contains the values of the given field.

stp.getLineValue(String fieldValue, int line)

This method is used to get a specified line value of a narrative Tag that may hold a value of multiple lines. **Parameters: **

  • String field value: This is any string value.

  • int line: This is used to determine which line value is to be returned.

This returns the value that is obtained according to the line number that is specified through the parameters.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

stp.updateFieldValue("BENE_ADD1",stp.getLineValue(TAG59,3));

stp.updateFieldValue("BENE_ADD2",stp.getLineValue(TAG59,4));

stp.updateFieldValue("BENE_ADD3",stp.getLineValue(TAG59,5));

stp.getLines(String fieldValue)

This is used to return a line from a field. Parameter:

  • String fieldValue: This is the source field of the line to be retrieved.

stp.getLocalBalTotalAmt(ccy)

This is used to get the total balance amount of the local customer. Parameters:

  • ccy: This is the currency in which the resulting balance is to be returned

[
EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var balAmtLocal = stp.getLocalBalTotalAmt("USD");

stp.getLocalTotalCollectAmt()

This is used to get the total amount, including the charge amount and VAT amount, collected from the local customer.

[
EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var localTotalCollAmt = stp.getLocalTotalCollectAmt();

stp.getLocalTotalCollectCharge()

This is used to get the total amount of bank charges collected from the local customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var localTotalCollChg = stp.getLocalTotalCollectCharge();

stp.getLocalTotalCollectVAT()

This is used to get the total VAT amount collected from the local customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var locaTotalCollVAT = stp.getLocalTotalCollectVAT();

stp.getLocalTotalPayAmt()

This is used to get the total amount paid by the local customer, including charge and VAT payments.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var locaTotalPayAmt =stp.getLocalTotalPayAmt();

stp.getLocalTotalPayCharge()

This is used to get the total amount of bank charges paid by the local customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var locaTotalPayChg = stp.getLocalTotalPayCharge()

stp.getLocalTotalPayVAT()

This is used to get the total VAT amount paid by the local customer.

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

var locaTotalPayVAT = stp.getLocalTotalPayVAT();

stp.getMultiLineValues(String fieldValue, int startLine, int endLine)

This is used to retrieve the multiple line values from a narrative field that holds a value of multiple lines.

  • String fieldValue: This is the field value or variable value. It can also be an expression that gets a field or variable value.

  • int startLine: This is the integer that determines the starting line of the string value that is to be obtained.

  • int endLine: This is the integer that determines the end line of the string value that is to be obtained.

This returns the string value based on the defined starting and end lines.

stp.getNodeValue(String strNodeName)

This method is used to retrieve the value of a node in an incoming XML file. Parameter:

  • String strNodeName: This is the XML node which value is to be retrieved.

stp.getPartValue(String fieldValue, int start, int length)

This method is used to get a particular part of a field value based on a specified starting position and a defined data length. This method has the same functionality as the DV.getPartValue(). The difference is that this function is to be used in the STP processing. Parameters:

  • String fieldValue: This is the field value or variable value. It can also be an expression that gets a field or variable value.

  • int start: This is the integer used to specify the starting position of the string value.

  • int length: This is the integer used to specify the length of the string value that is to be obtained.

This returns the string value based on the defined starting position and length.

stp.getPcUnitCode()

This is used to retrieve the unit code of the process center.

stp.getRecord(String doName,String sCondition)

This method is used for retrieving a data object record based on a defined condition. Parameters:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for retrieving the record.

stp.getRecords(String doName)

This method is used to retrieve the records of a data object. Parameter:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object. This can be an xPath.

This returns an array of records.

stp.getSTPCode()

This method is used to automatically retrieve the STP code when an incoming message is received via STP.

stp.getSWIFTTagValue(String tagName):String

This is used to identify the value of a Tag in a SWIFT message. **Parameter: **

  • String tagName: This is the SWIFT Tag.

This returns the value of the specified Tag in the original incoming SWIFT message.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

var TagB6= stp.getSWIFTTagValue("B6");

stp.getSum(String doName,String fieldName)

This is used to get the sum of the values of a field in a data object. Parameters:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String fieldName: This is the field, from a data object with multiple records, which sum is to be obtained.

stp.getSysBusiDate():String

This is used to get the system business date value from the database.

This returns the business date value of the business unit that is stored in TRX_SOD_EOD table in the database.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

stp.setAutoProcess(true);

var ref=stp.SYS_getRefNo('EXNE');

var LC = ref.substr(0, 2);

var Sequence = ref.substring(2);

var BusiDate =stp.getSysBusiDate();

var year =BusiDate.substring(2,4);

stp.updateFieldValue('C_MAIN_REF',LC+year+Sequence);

stp.setEventTimes(0);

[NOTE]{.underline}: In this sample, stp.getSysBusiDate() is used to get the business date (Latest SOD date) of the transaction unit and extract the year from the date, combining this with the transaction reference number.

stp.getSysDate():String

This is used to get the system date value from the application server. The usage is similar to that of the stp.getSysBusiDate() method. The difference lies in that the value that is returned is the system date instead of the business date.

stp.getSysTime()

This method is used to retrieve the current system time.

stp.getTSUBIC()

This is used to retrieve the related BIC of the TSU message.

stp.getTSUUnitCode()

This method is used to get the unit code defined in the related FTP setting.

stp.getTrxDoc(boolean bCheck):String

This method isused to get the DOM data. Parameters:

  • bCheck: This indicates the manner by which the the DOM data are obtained. This may have the following values: true (wherein the system gets the current DOM data directly), and false (wherein the system checks for the latest DOM data and updates the data in the event that these are not the most recent records.

stp.getTsuXMLNodeValue(String nodeName,String strSheetName,String strSheetSeparator)

This is used to get the value of a node in a TSU XML file. Parameters:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String strSheetName: This indicates the name of the related GAPI worksheet.

  • String strSheetSeparator: This indicates the the separator character used in the GAPI worksheet.

stp.getValue(String doName,String fieldName)

This method is used to get the value of a field from a data object. Parameters:

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String fieldName: This is the data object field which value is to be retrieved.

This returns the value of the indicated DO field.

stp.getValue(String fieldName, String doName ,String sCondition)

This method is used to get the value of a field from a data object according to a defined condition. Parameters:

  • String fieldName: This is the data object field which value is to be retrieved.

  • String doName: This is the name of the data object.

  • String sCondition: This is the condition for determining the record that contains the field which value is to be retrieved. The condition, which is similar to an SQL statement, can be null. When this results in more than one value (record), the system returns the first value.

This returns a String.

stp.getValueFromGAPI(String)

This is used to get the value of a receiving field from a GAPI message. This is usually used after the stp.inqGAPI() method is invoked. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the name of the field which value is to be obtained after the inqGAPI method is invoked.

This returns the value of the specified field.

stp.getXMLNodeValue(String nodeName)

This is used to get the value of a node in an XML file. Parameter:

  • String nodeName: This is the node in the XML file.

stp.getXMLNodeValue(String nodeName,String strSheetName,String strSheetSeparator)

This is used to get the value of a node in an XML file. Parameters:

  • String nodeName: This is the node in the XML file.

  • String strSheetName: This indicates the name of the related GAPI worksheet.

  • String strSheetSeparator: This indicates the the separator character used in the GAPI worksheet.

stp.init(trx2ChgType,chg2CollType,rule2UnpaidType,unpaid2CollType)

This method is used to set the initial exchange rate to be used for a charge transactions.

Parameters:

  • trx2ChgType: This is the exchange rate applied between Transaction- and Charge Agreement-Currency

  • chg2CollType: This is the exchange rate applied between Charge Collect- and Charge Agreement-Currency

  • rule2UnpaidType: This is the exchange rate applied between Charge Unpaid- and Charge Agreement-Currency

  • unpaid2CollType: This is the exchange rate applied between Charge Collect- and Charge Unpaid-Currency

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.init("Booking Rate", "Booking Rate", "Booking Rate", "Booking Rate");

stp.inqGAPI(String)

This is used to inquire the GAPI rule name that is set in the EE Utility GAPI function. **Parameter: **

  • String: This is the GAPI rule name defined in the EE Utility through the GAPI function. The transaction type of the GAPI rule is Inquire.

This does not return any value.

stp.isFromSWIFTMaintenance()

This method is used to determine whether or not the incoming SWIFT message is received through the SWIFT maintenance function.

stp.mapDynamicParas(dynaPara)

This method is used to calculate charges based on dynamic fields. Parameter:

  • dynaPara: This is the array of dynamic fields.

stp.mapForeignCust(custID,custName,custCCY,custACNO)

This method is used to define the field names that are related to the local customer.

Parameters:

  • custID: This is the field name of the foreign customer Id.

  • custName: This is the field name of the coreign customer Name.

  • custCCY: This is the name of the ‘Foreign Customer Pay CCY’ field.

  • custACNO: This is the field name of the foreign customer account number field name

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.mapForeignCust("BENE_ID", "BENE_NM", "BENE_CCY", "BENE_ACNO");

stp.mapLocalCust(custID,custName,custCCY,custACNO)

This method is used to define the field names that are related to the local customer.

Parameters:

  • custID: This is the field name of the local customer Id.

  • custName: This is the field name of the local customer name.

  • custCCY: This is the name of the ‘Local Customer Pay CCY’ field.

  • custACNO: This is the field name of the local customer account number

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.mapLocalCust("APPL_ID","APPL_NM",“CUST_PAY_CCY","CUST_ACNO");

stp.match(String matchRule, String ruleData)

This method is used to perform auto matching for MT300, MT320, MT305 and MT306. Parameters:

  • String matchRule: This is the SWIFT message type.

  • String ruleData: This is the name of the matching rule. Multiple rules may specified, separated by this character: |.

stp.mergeDO2TrxDom()

This method is currently not used for the Incoming SWIFT transaction function component.

stp.resetBU(String)

This is used to re-route the transaction to another business unit other than the STP processing unit. Normally, the Unit Code of the record is that of the message receiving and processing unit. When this method is used, the system sets the unit code value of the record as the unit that is defined in the method. Parameter:

  • String: This indicates the business unit ID to which the record belongs.

This does not return any value.

stp.resetFunc(String )

This is used to reset the function settings.

This returns a Boolean.

stp.setAllCollCcy(ccy)

This method is used to set the initial charge collect currency.

Parameters:

  • ccy: This is the bank collection currency

[
EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.setAllCollCcy('USD');


stp.setAllDefPayAt(String at)

This method is used to set the deferred charges Pay at value. Parameter:

  • String: This is the value of the deferred Pay At charge.

**
**

stp.setAllLocalPayCcy(ccy)

This method is used to set the value of the ‘Local Customer Pay CCY’ field. Parameter:

  • ccy: This is the local customer payment currency.

stp.setAllPayAt(payAt)

This is used to set the initial value of the ‘Paid At’ field. Parameters:

  • payAt: This is the value of the ‘Paid At’ field. The possible values are STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION (Transaction), STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED (Deferred), STP.CHG_AT_FREE (Waived).

[
EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.setAllPayAt(STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION);

stp.setAllPayBy(payBy)

This is used to set the value of the ‘Paid By’ field. Parameter:

  • payBy: This is the value of the ‘Paid By’ field. The possible values are: STP. CHG_FOR_LOCAL (Local Customer), and STP.CHG_FOR_FOREIGN (Foreign Customer).

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.setAllPayBy(STP.CHG_FOR_LOCAL);

stp.setAllUnpaidCcy(ccy)

This method is used to set the value of ‘Balance CCY’ field. Parameter:

  • ccy: This is the balance currency.

[
EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.setAllUnpaidCcy('USD');

stp.setAutoProcess(Boolean bAuto):void

This is used to decide whether the pending or master record is to be generated directly in the database by running STP or as a record with an S status. In case of the latter, a Fix function must process the record. This is similar to the result of saving a transaction in the EE system. This method must be set before creating the scripts for the transaction field value. Parameter:

  • Boolean bAuto: This may be set as either True or False. Setting this to True indicates that the pending or master record is to be generated directly into the database; setting this to False, on the other hand, indicates that the record is to be generated as a record with an S status.

This does not return any value.

stp.setDOValue(Element eDo,String fieldName,String value)

This method is used to set or assign the value of a data object field. Parameters:

  • Element eDO: This is the element name of the data object**.**

  • String fieldName: This is the field of the data object which value is to be set.

  • String value: This is the value to be assigned to the field.

This does not return any value.

stp.setDefChargeScope(scope)

This is used to define the condition when retrieving deferred charges (i.e., transaction reference, main reference). Parameters:

  • scope: This is the condition for retrieving the deferred charges. The possible values are: SCOPE_MAINREF (deferred charges are to be retrieved from the main or whole transaction), TRXREF (deferred charges are to be retrieved from a transaction reference), MAINWITHTRXREF (deferred charges are to be retrieved from both the main and transaction reference).

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

stp.setDefChargeScope(DV.SCOPE_MAINREF);

stp.setDefPayAt(String commCode, String at)

This is used to set the initial value of the deferred charge’s Paid At field. Parameters:

  • String commCode: This is the value of the commission code
  • payAt: This is the value of the ‘Paid At’ field. The possible values are: STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION (Transaction), STP.CHG_AT_DEFERRED (Deferred), STP.CHG_AT_FREE (Waived).

[EXAMPLE]{.underline}:

STP.setDefPayAt(STP.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION);

stp.setDiscRate(String, int)

This is used to set the discount rate. Parameters:

  • String: This is the commission code or the commission code string list array

  • int: This is the discount rate
