| +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getCollect2LocalCustPayRate () | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to return the exchange rate for | | converting the calculation from the bank collection currency to the | | customer payment currency of the Local Customer. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var strRateColl2LocalPay = Chg.Screen.getCollect2LocalCustPayRate(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getCollect2ForeignCustPayRate () | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to return the exchange rate for | | converting the calculation from the bank collection currency to the | | payment currency of the foreign customer. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var strRateColl2ForeignPay = | | Chg.Screen.getCollect2ForeignCustPayRate(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.mapCollect2CustPayRate(localRateFieldNm,localDMflag,fore | | ignRateFieldNm,\ | | foreignDMflag) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to inform the Charge component of the | | rate field names that is used for converting the calculation from the | | bank collection currency to the payment currency of the customer. The | | Charge component may retrieve this information from the given fields | | (or parameters in this API). | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - localRateFieldNm: This is the current exchange rate in the local | | customer’s country. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | - localDMflag: This parameter indicates what operator (Multiply or | | Divide) to use for converting the calculation from the bank | | collection currency to the payment currency of the local | | customer. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | - foreignRateFieldNm: This is the current exchange rate in the | | foreign customer’s country. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | - foreignDMflag: This indicates what operator (Multiply or Divide) | | to use for converting the calculation from the bank collection | | currency to the payment currency of the foreign customer. This | | parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.mapCollect2CustPayRate("CHG_LOCAL_CUST_PAY_RATE","M | | ","CHG_FOREIGN_ | | CUST_PAY_RATE","M"); | +———————————————————————–+

#######

####### Charge Header Information APIs

+———————————————————————–+ | CHG_setAllChargeFor(chgFor) | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API is used to set the value of the Charge For (or | | Paid By) field for all the charge entries of the Charge page. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | The parameter refers to the value of the Charge For field. This can | | be set to: | | | | - L, for Local Customer | | | | | | | | - F, for Foreign Customer | | | | This parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | CHG_setAllChargeFor("F"); | +———————————————————————–+ | CHG_setAllChargeAt(chargeAt) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to set the value of the Charge At (or | | Paid At) field for all the charge entries of the Charge page. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | The parameter refers to the value of the Charge At field. This can be | | set to: | | | | - 0, for: Transaction | | | | | | | | - 1, for Deferred | | | | | | | | - 3, for Free (or Waived) | | | | This parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | CHG_setAllChargeAt(1); | +———————————————————————–+ | CHG_setAllCollCcy(CollCcy) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to set the value of the ‘Bank Collect | | CCY’ field for all the charge entries of the Charge page. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - CollCcy: This indicates the collection currency of the bank. This | | parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | CHG_setAllCollCcy(SYS_LOCAL_CCY); | +———————————————————————–+ | CHG_setAllLocalPayCcy(PayCcy) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to set the value of the ‘Local Customer | | Pay CCY’ field for all the charge entries in the Charge page. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - PayCcy: This indicates the currency of the local customer. This | | parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | CHG_setAllLocalPayCcy(document.MAINFORM.LC_CCY.value); | +———————————————————————–+ | CHG_setAllBalCcy(balCcy) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to set the value of the ‘Balance CCY’ | | field for all the charge entries of the Charge page. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - balCcy: This refers to the currency of the balance. This | | parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | CHG_setAllBalCcy("USD"); | +———————————————————————–+

#######

####### Charge Entry Information APIs

+———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getAllTrxCharge() | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API is used to retrieve all the transaction charge | | entries from the transaction page. Chg.Screen.getAllTrxCharge() | | returns an array containing Charge objects. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var trxChgArr = Chg.Screen.getAllTrxCharge(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getAllDefCharge() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used for retrieving all the deferred charge | | entries from the transaction page. Chg.Screen.getAllDefCharge() | | returns an array containing Charge objects. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var defChgArr = Chg.Screen.getAllDefCharge(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.holdDefToDraw(type); | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to associate the main deferred charge - | | which is the deferred charge generated directly by the main reference | | - to the transaction reference (drawing reference). The main deferred | | charge is then locked to this transaction reference and therefore, in | | the next drawing action, the main deferred charges which are | | associated to other transaction references (drawing references) are | | not displayed. To store the related transaction reference, the field | | C_ASSIGN_TRX_REF is available in the charge deferred table. This | | parameter may be applied for both foreign and/or local deferred | | charges. | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | When displaying the deferred charge, the system validates the value | | that is specified in the "scope" parameter of the main JSP file. | | | | This API is applied to functions, which processes are based on the | | transaction reference. (e.g., Document Check, Pay/Accept) | | | | This API is applicable to all charges except to the Central Charge | | Module. | | | | In an AP transaction, the main deferred charge is locked to the | | relevant transaction reference. Once the transaction is released, the | | main deferred charge is then unlocked from this transaction reference | | and the hold mark is applied. | | | | After performing Cancellation, the hold mark will be rolled back. The | | deferred charge is unlocked and it cannot be modified. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - Type: This specifies which deferred charges are to be associated | | to the relevant drawing reference. This parameter may have one of | | the following values: | | | | | | | | - FOREIGN, in which the main foreign deferred charge is associated | | > to the relevant drawing reference. | | | | - LOCAL, in which the main local deferred charge is associated to | | > the relevant drawing reference. | | | | - ALL, in which all main deferred charges are associated to the | | > relevant drawing reference. This is the default value of the | | > parameter. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function ConfirmBusinessCall() (){ | | | | try { | | | | SYM_EPLC_CHARGE_FOR_CONFIRM(); | | | | Chg.Screen.holdDefToDraw(“LOCAL”); | | | | } catch (e) { | | | | DisExcpt (“SYF_EPLC_EPLC_RegisterDocuments.js”,e); | | | | } | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | CHG_attachSetDefChargeAt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to change the value of the ‘Charge At’ | | field of the deferred charges according to the current value of the | | ‘Charge At’ field in the Charge page header. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | CHG_attachSetDefChargeAt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.setChargeValue(commCode, strCcy, strAmt) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used for directly specifying the amount of a | | particular charge item. This amount is displayed in the ‘Charge | | Amount’ field of the corresponding charge entry. The other field | | values are updated or calculated according to this specified amount. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - strCcy: This refers to the currency. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | - strAmt: This refers to the amount of charge. This parameter is | | mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.setChargeValue([sCommCode], SYS_LOCAL_CCY, '0'); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getTrxChargeByCommCode(commCode) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the charge entry from the transaction | | page based on the given commission code. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var objPymtCommChrgs = | | Chg.Screen.getTrxChargeByCommCode(chargeCode1); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getDefChargeByCommCode(commCode) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the deferred charge entry from the | | transaction page based on the given commission code. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var objDefChg = Chg.Screen.getDefChargeByCommCode(commCode); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.setTrxTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex, strValue) | +———————————————————————–+ | In some cases, certain information must be stored for a particular | | charge entry. For each charge entry, there are ten temporary (temp) | | fields that may be used for this purpose. | | | | This JavaScript API is used to set the value of a temp field for a | | specific transaction charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCode; This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | > mandatory. | | | | | | | | - strIndex: This refers to the position of the temp field which | | value is to be set. This parameter can be from 1 to 10. This | | parameter is mandatory. | | | | | | | | - strValue: This refers to the value that is to be defined for the | | temp field. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.setTrxTempFieldVaule(comcode,'5',document.MAINFORM.CHG_ | | LOCAL_CUST_PAY_RATE.value); | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getTrxTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex) | +=======================================================================+ | In some cases, certain information must be stored for a particular | | charge entry. For each charge entry, there are ten temporary (temp) | | fields that may be used for this purpose. | | | | The Chg.Screen.getTrxTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex) JavaScript | | API returns the value of a temp field for a specific transaction | | charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - strIndex: This refers to the position of the temp field value to | | be retrieved. This parameter can be from 1 to 10. This parameter | | is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var chgTempValue1 = Chg.Screen.getTrxTempFieldVaule("SWIFT_COMM", | | "1"); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.setDefTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex, strValue) | +———————————————————————–+ | In some cases, certain information must be stored for a particular | | charge entry. For each charge entry, there are ten temporary (temp) | | fields that may be used for this purpose. | | | | The Chg.Screen.setDefTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex, strValue) | | JavaScript API is used to set the value of a temp field for a | | specific deferred charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | strIndex: This refers to the position of the temp field which value | | is to be set. This parameter can be from 1 to 10. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - strValue: This refers to the value that is to be defined for the | | temp field. This field is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.setDefTempFieldVaule("SWIFT_COMM", "1", | | "trancode"); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.getDefTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex) | +———————————————————————–+ | In some cases, certain information must be stored for a particular | | charge entry. For each charge entry, there are ten temporary (temp) | | fields that may be used for this purpose. | | | | The Chg.Screen.getDefTempFieldVaule(commCode, strIndex) JavaScript | | API returns the value of a temp field for a specific deferred charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - strIndex: This refers to the position of the temp field which | | value is to be set. This parameter can be from 1 to 10. This | | parameter is mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var chgTempValue1 = Chg.Screen.getDefTempFieldVaule("SWIFT_COMM", | | "1"); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.protectAllChargeFor() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to protect the corresponding Charge For | | field for each charge category. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.protectAllChargeFor(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.protectAllChargeAt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to protect the corresponding Charge At | | field of each charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.protectAllChargeAt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.protectAllCollectAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to protect the corresponding Collect | | Amount field of each charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.protectAllCollectAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.unprotectAllCollectAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to unprotect the corresponding Collect | | Amount field of each charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.unprotectAllCollectAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | Chg.Screen.unprotectAllBalAmt() | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API is used to unprotect the corresponding Balance | | Amount field of each charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.Screen.unprotectAllBalAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objDefEntry.getOldBalAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the old or previous amount of a deferred | | charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var DefCharges = objDefEntry.getOldBalAmt(). | +———————————————————————–+ | defEntry.hide(); | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to hide and unlock deferred charges. | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} This API does not perform any action on | | charges that are to be paid at transaction. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var chgs = Chg.Screen.getAllDefChargs(); | | | | for(var i=0.i<chgs.length;i++){ | | | | chgs[i].hide(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objTrxEntry.display() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to display the charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | objTrxEntry.display([‘SWIFT_CHG’]) | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | objTrxEntry.getDiscRate() | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API returns the discount percentage for the | | SWIFT_FEE charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var objTrxChg = Chg.Screen.getTrxChargeByCommCode(“SWIFT_FEE”); | | | | Var discountPer = objTrxChg.getDiscRate(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objTrxEntry.hide() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to hide a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | objTrxEntry.hide([‘SWIFT_CHG’]) | +———————————————————————–+ | objTrxEntry.isHide() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the ‘Hide’ status of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | objTrxEntry.isHide([‘SWIFT_CHG’]) | +———————————————————————–+ | objTrxEntry.reset() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to clear the data of the charge entries. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE: ]{.underline} | | | | objTrxEntry.reset([‘SWIFT_CHG’]) | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getActiveAmt() | +=======================================================================+ | After the Charge component retrieves the calculation results, the | | user can edit the information. The value of an amount after it has | | been edited is the active amount. | | | | The objChgEntry.getActiveAmt() JavaScript API returns the active | | amount of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var actAmt = objChgEntry.getActiveAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getActiveCcy() | +———————————————————————–+ | After the Charge component retrieves the calculation results, the | | user can edit the information. The value of a Currency field after it | | has been edited is the active currency. | | | | The objChgEntry.getActiveCcy() JavaScript API returns the active | | currency of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var actCcy = objChgEntry.getActiveCcy(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getBalAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the balance amount of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var balAmt = objChgEntry.getBalAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getBalCcy() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the balance currency of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var balCcy = objChgEntry.getBalCcy(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getChargeAt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the Charge At value of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/a | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var chgAt = objChgEntry.getChargeAt() | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getChargeFor() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the Charge For value of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var chgFor = objChgEntry.getChargeFor(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getCollectAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the Collect Amount value of a charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var colAmt = objChgEntry.getCollectAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getCollectCcy() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the Collect CCY value of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var colCcy = objChgEntry.getCollectCcy(); | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getCollectVatAmt() | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API returns to the Vat Amount value of a charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var colVAmt = objChgEntry.getCollectVatAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getCommCode() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the Commission Code value of a charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var commCode = objChgEntry.getCommCode(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getCommDesc() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the Commission Description of a charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var commDesc = objChgEntry.getCommDesc(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getDiscAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the discount amount of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var discAmt = objChgEntry.getDiscAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getPayAmt() | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API returns the amount paid for a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var pAmt = objChgEntry.getPayAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getPayCcy() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the payment currency of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var pCcy = objChgEntry.getPayCcy(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getPayVatAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the VAT amount paid for a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var pVAmt = objChgEntry.getPayVatAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getRuleAmt() | +———————————————————————–+ | A rule amount pertains to the resulting amount of a charge | | calculation using a charge rule. | | | | The objChgEntry.getRuleAmt() JavaScript API returns the rule amount | | of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var rAmt = objChgEntry.getRuleAmt(); | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getRuleCcy() | +=======================================================================+ | A rule currency pertains to the resulting currency of a charge | | calculation using a charge rule. | | | | This JavaScript API returns the rule currency of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var rCcy = objChgEntry.getRuleCcy(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getTempField(index) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the value of a temporary field for a | | charge entry. The parameter is: | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - Index: This refers to the position of the field value to be | | retrieved. index can be from ‘1’ to ‘10’. This parameter is | | mandatory. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var tFld = objChgEntry.getTempField(index); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.getVatRate() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API returns the VAT rate of a charge entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var vRte = objChgEntry.getVatRate(); | +———————————————————————–+ | objChgEntry.setTempField(index, value) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API sets the value of a temporary field for a charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - Index: This refers to the position of the field which value is to | | be set. index can be from ‘1’ to ‘10’. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | - Value: This refers to the value to be assigned to the charge | | entry. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var tFld = objChgEntry.setTempField(index, value); | +———————————————————————–+

####### Charge Data APIs

+———————————————————————–+ | Chg.calculate(commCodeArr,trxCcy,amount,sDate,eDate,from,to,baseDay | | ,plusTimes,\ | | extendFldsArr, dealRate) | +=======================================================================+ | This is JavaScript API is used to calculate charges. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCodeArr: This is used to determine the commission code from | | an array of values. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | > [NOTE:]{.underline} | | > | | > If there is more than one commission code, the array should be | | > written as: | | > | | > Var arr=[‘first commission code’, ‘second commission code’,'…'] | | | | - trxCCY: This is the currency used in the transaction. This | | > parameter is optional. | | | | - amount: This is the amount involved in the transaction. The | | > default value is 0. This parameter is optional. | | | | - sDate: This is the start date of the transaction. The default | | > value is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - eDate: This is the end date of the transaction. The default value | | > is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - from: This indicates the location of the sender of the express | | > fee; the cable charges; defaults to null.\ | | > This parameter is optional. | | | | - to: This indicates the location of the recipient of the express | | > fee; the cable charges, defaults to null.\ | | > This parameter is optional. | | | | - baseDay: This indicates the base number of days used in the | | > calculation of interest. The default value is 365,\ | | > which is used by most countries. This parameter is optional. | | | | - plusTimes: This defined the number of times that the charges are | | > calculated. | | | | - extendFldsArr: This allows the value of fields to be stored, | | > allowing the fields to be reusable. | | | | - dealRate: This is the exchange rate from the Charge CCY to the | | > Transaction CCY. This is used to calculate the charge amount if | | > the Transaction CCY is different from the Charge CCY. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var arr = ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM']; | | | | var amt = document.getElementById('LC_AMT').value; | | | | var ccy = document.getElementById('LC_CCY').value; | | | | Chg.calculate(arr,ccy,amt,document.MAINFORM.ISSUE_DT.value,document. | | MAINFORM.EXPIRY_DT.value); | +———————————————————————–+ | chg.calculateWithStartLevel:function(commCodeArr,startLevel,trxCcy, | | amount,sDate,eDate,\ | | from,to,baseDay, plusTimes,extendFldsArr,overWitAgreeSSS) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is a client-side API used to calculate charges, with the added | | functionality of defining the start level for checking the charge | | agreement to be applied to the commission code. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commCodeArr: This is used to determine the commission code from | | an array of values. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | > [NOTE:]{.underline} | | > | | > If there is more than one commission code, the array should be | | > written as: | | > | | > Var arr=[‘first commission code’, ‘second commission code’,'…'] | | | | - startLevel: The level on which the system first checks or starts | | to check for the charge agreement to be applied to the commission | | code. The possible values are: | | | | - Chg.Level.CUSTOMER, for Customer or Bank level. This is the | | default option. | | | | - Chg.Level.COMM_RANGE, for Customer or Bank Range level | | | | - Chg.Level.BUSINESS_UNIT, for Business Unit level | | | | - Chg.Level.COUNTRY, for Country level | | | | - Chg.Level.STANDARD, for Standard level | | | | - trxCCY: This is the currency used in the transaction. This | | parameter is optional. | | | | - amount: This is the amount involved in the transaction. The | | default value is 0. This parameter is optional. | | | | - sDate: This is the start date of the transaction. The default | | value is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - eDate: This is the end date of the transaction. The default value | | is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - from: This indicates the location of the sender of the express | | fee; the cable charges; defaults to null. This parameter is | | optional. | | | | - to: This indicates the location of the recipient of the express | | fee; the cable charges, defaults to null. This parameter is | | optional. | | | | - baseDay: This indicates the base number of days used in the | | calculation of interest. The default value is 365, which is used | | by most countries. This parameter is optional. | | | | - plusTimes: This defined the number of times that the charges are | | calculated. | | | | - extendFldsArr: This allows the value of fields to be stored, | | allowing the fields to be reusable. | | | | - overWitAgreeSSS: This is reserved for future use. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.calculateWithStartLevel(['EPLC_ADVISE_COMM'],\ | | Chg.Level.BUSINESS_UNIT,document.MAINFORM.LC_CCY.value,\ | | document.MAINFORM.LC_AMT.value,document.MAINFORM.ISSUE_DT.value,doc | | ument.MAINFORM.EXPIRY_DT.value) | +———————————————————————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | Chg.amendmentCalculate(amendmentCommCode,increaseAmtCommCode,\ | | extensionCommCode,trxCcy,oldAmt,increaseAmt,uptoDate,amendmentDate,ex | | piryDate,baseDay) | +=======================================================================+ | This JavaScript API is used for calculating amendment commission. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - amendmentCommCode: This is the commission code for the amendment. | | > This parameter is mandatory. | | | | - increaseAmtCommCode: This increases the amount of the commission | | > code. It is used only in the event of an increase, in which the | | > extensionCommCode must be null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - extensionCommCode: This extends the period used with the | | > commission code. It is used only if there is an extension, in | | > which the increaseAmtCommCode must be null. This parameter is | | > optional. | | | | - trxCcy: This is the currency used in the transaction. This | | > parameter is optional. | | | | - oldAmt: This is the original amount of the transaction. This | | > parameter is optional. | | | | - increaseAmt: This is used in increasing the amount of the | | > transaction. This parameter is optional. | | | | - uptoDate: This is the original end date for the payment of | | > charges. This parameter is optional. | | | | - amendmentDate: This is the amended end date for the payment of | | > charges. This parameter is optional. | | | | - expiryDate: This is the adjusted expiry date for the letter of | | > credit. This parameter is optional. | | | | - baseDay: This indicated the base number of days used in the | | > calculation of interest.\ | | > The default value is 365, which is used by many countries. This | | > parameter is optional. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var arr = ['IPLC_AMEND_COMM']; | | | | var oldAmt = | | SYS_BeFloat(document.getElementById('LC_AMT').value); | | | | var increaseAmt = | | SYS_BeFloat(document.getElementById('INC_AMT').value); | | | | var trxCcy = document.getElementById('LC_CCY').value; | | | | var uptoDate = document.MAINFORM.EXPIRY_DT.value; | | | | var amendmentDate =document.getElementById('AMD_DT').value; | | | | var expiryDate =document.getElementById('NEW_EXPIRY_DT').value; | | | | Chg.amendmentCalculate(arr,arr, | | arr,trxCcy,oldAmt,increaseAmt,uptoDate,amendmentDate,expiryDate); | +———————————————————————–+ | Chg.callCalcService(trxCcy,amount,commCode,chargeFor,custID,collect | | Ccy,\ | | rateType,sDate,eDate,from,to,baseDay,plusTimes,extendFlds) | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used to calculate charges if the Charges tab | | is not required in the screen. | | | | The Chg.callCalcService API returns the results in data form: | | aResult[0]. aResult[0] indicates the status\ | | of the calculation. If this is null or empty, the calculation is | | successfully completed. Otherwise, the following\ | | data are returned to indicate the source of the error: | | | | - aResult[1]: This returns rule CCY (the currency resulting | | > from a charge calculation using a charge rule). | | | | - aResult[2]: This returns the rule Amt (the amount resulting | | > from a charge calculation using a charge rule). | | | | - aResult[3]: This returns the rule Info (other information | | > resulting from a charge calculation using a charge rule). | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - trxCcy: This refers to the transaction currency. This parameter | | is mandatory. | | | | - amount: This refers to the transaction amount. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - chargeFor: This refers to the ‘Charge For’ field. The value can | | be: | | | | - L, for Local | | | | - - F, for Foreign | | | | - custID: This refers to the Customer ID. If the Charge For flag is | | se to ‘L’, this pertains to the\ | | local customer ID; if ‘F’, foreign customer ID. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - collectCcy: This refers to the bank collection currency. This | | parameter is mandatory. | | | | - rateType: This refers to the rate type for retrieving the | | exchange rate to convert the calculation from the charge | | agreement currency to the transaction currency. | | | | - sDate: This refers to the start date of the transaction. The | | default value is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - eDate: This refers to the end date of the transaction. The | | default value is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - from: This refers to the location of the sender of the express | | fee or cable charges. This parameter is optional. | | | | - to: This refers to the location of the recipient of the express | | fee or cable charges. This parameter is optional. | | | | - baseDay: This refers to the base number of days for one year that | | is used in the calculation of interest.\ | | The default value is 365, which is used by most countries. | | | | - plusTimes: This defines the number of times the charges are | | calculated. This parameter is optional. | | | | - extendFlds: This is currently a reserved parameter. This | | parameter is optional. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Var | | aResult=Chg.callCalcService("USD","100","EXCO_COLL_COMM","L\ | | “,"CS0001","USD","Booking | | Rate"); | | | | if(aResult[0] != "") | | | | {alert("Has error:" + aResult[0]); } | | | | else{ | | | | var ruleCCY = aResult[1]; | | | | var ruleAmt = aResult[2]; | | | | var ruleInfo= aResult[3]; | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | chg.callCalcServiceWithStartLevel:function(trxCcy,amount,commCode,s | | tartLevel,chargeFor,custID,\ | | collectCcy,rateType,sDate,eDate,from,to,baseDay,plusTimes,extendFlds, | | overWitAgreeSSS) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is a client-side API used to calculate charges if the Charges | | tab is not required in the screen, with the\ | | added functionality of defining the start level for checking the | | charge agreement to be applied to the commission code. | | | | The Chg.callCalcService API returns the results in data form: | | aResult[0]. aResult[0] indicates the status of the calculation. | | If this is null or empty, the calculation is successfully completed. | | Otherwise, the following data are returned to indicate the source of | | the error: | | | | - aResult[1]: This returns rule CCY (the currency resulting | | > from a charge calculation using a charge rule). | | | | - aResult[2]: This returns the rule Amt (the amount resulting | | > from a charge calculation using a charge rule). | | | | - aResult[3]: This returns the rule Info (other information | | > resulting from a charge calculation using a charge rule). | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - trxCcy: This refers to the transaction currency. This parameter | | is mandatory. | | | | - amount: This refers to the transaction amount. | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. This parameter is | | mandatory. | | | | - chargeFor: This refers to the ‘Charge For’ field. The value can | | be: | | | | - L, for Local | | | | - F, for Foreign | | | | - startLevel: The level on which the system first checks or starts | | to check for the charge agreement to be applied to the commission | | code. The possible values are: | | | | - Chg.Level.CUSTOMER, for Customer or Bank level. This is the | | > default option. | | | | - Chg.Level.COMM_RANGE, for Customer or Bank Range level | | | | - Chg.Level.BUSINESS_UNIT, for Business Unit level | | | | - Chg.Level.COUNTRY, for Country level | | | | - Chg.Level.STANDARD, for Standard level | | | | - custID: This refers to the Customer ID. If the Charge For flag is | | se to ‘L’, this pertains to the local customer ID; if ‘F’, | | foreign customer ID. This parameter is mandatory. | | | | - collectCcy: This refers to the bank collection currency. This | | parameter is mandatory. | | | | - rateType: This refers to the rate type for retrieving the | | exchange rate to convert the calculation from the charge | | agreement currency to the transaction currency. | | | | - sDate: This refers to the start date of the transaction. The | | default value is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - eDate: This refers to the end date of the transaction. The | | default value is null. This parameter is optional. | | | | - from: This refers to the location of the sender of the express | | fee or cable charges. This parameter is optional. | | | | - to: This refers to the location of the recipient of the express | | fee or cable charges. This parameter is optional. | | | | - baseDay: This refers to the base number of days for one year that | | is used in the calculation of interest. The default value is 365, | | which is used by most countries. | | | | - plusTimes: This defines the number of times the charges are | | calculated. This parameter is optional. | | | | - extendFlds: This is currently a reserved parameter. This | | parameter is optional. | | | | - overWitAgreeSSS: This is reserved for future use. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | Chg.callCalcServiceWithStartLevel(document.MAINFORM.LC_CCY.value, | | document.MAINFORM.LC_AMT.value, EPLC_ADVISE_COMM, | | Chg.LEVEL.CUSTOMER,'L','06130cus01','USD','Booking rate'); | +———————————————————————–+ | ChgVoucher() | +———————————————————————–+ | This JavaScript API is used for generating the output voucher upon | | transaction confirmation. It is declared within the function’s | | ConfirmBusinessCall() method. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | N/A | +———————————————————————–+ | DV. calculateWithStartLevel (commListArr, calPara) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is a server-side API is used to calculate charges, with the | | added functionality of defining the start level for checking the | | charge agreement to be applied to the commission code. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - commListArr: This refers to the commission code list array. | | | | - calPara: This refers to the parameter string array. The order is: | | | | - startLevel: The level on which the system first checks or | | > starts to check for the charge agreement to be applied to | | > the commission code. The possible values are | | > DV.LEVEL_CUSTOMER (also the default value), | | > DV.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE, DV.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT, | | > DV.LEVEL_COUNTRY, and DV.LEVEL_STANDARD. | | | | - trxCcy: This is the currency used in the transaction. | | | | - amount: This is the amount involved in the transaction. | | | | - sDate: This is the start date of the transaction. | | | | - eDate: This is the end date of the transaction. | | | | - from: This indicates the location of the sender of the | | > express fee; the cable charges; defaults to null. | | | | - to: This indicates the location of the recipient of the | | > express fee; the cable charges, defaults to null.baseDay | | | | - plusTimes: This defined the number of times that the charges | | > are calculated. | | | | - extendFldsArr: This allows the value of fields to be stored, | | > allowing the fields to be reusable. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var result = DV.calculateWithStartLevel(comList,parameter); | | | | DV.confirmCharge() | +———————————————————————–+ | DV. callCalcServiceWithStartLevel(calPara) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is a server-side API used to calculate charges if the Charges | | tab is not required in the screen, with the added functionality of | | defining the start level for checking the charge agreement to be | | applied to the commission code. | | | | This method results in an array containing: | | | | - errorMsg: This is the error message when an exception occurs. | | | | - ruleCCY: This is the currency calculated according to the charge | | rate rule. It can also be calculated according to the Override | | agreement. | | | | - ruleAmt: This is the amount calculated according to the charge | | rate rule. It can also be calculated according to the Override | | agreement. | | | | - rateInfo: This is the rate calculated according to the charge | | rate rule. It can also be calculated according to the Override | | agreement. | | | | - standingCcy: This is the standard currency, without the Override | | agreement. | | | | - standingAmt: This is the standard amount, without the Override | | agreement. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - calPara: This refers to the following parameters: | | | | - trxCcy: This refers to the transaction currency. | | | | - amount: This refers to the transaction amount. | | | | - commCode: This refers to the commission code. | | | | - startLevel The level on which the system first checks or | | > starts to check for the charge agreement to be applied to | | > the commission code. The possible values are | | > DV.LEVEL_CUSTOMER (also the default value), | | > DV.LEVEL_COMM_RANGE, DV.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT, | | > DV.LEVEL_COUNTRY, and DV.LEVEL_STANDARD. | | | | - chargeFor: This refers to the ‘Charge For’ field. The value | | > can be L, for Local or F, for Foreign. | | | | - custID: This refers to the Customer ID. If the Charge For | | > flag is se to ‘L’, this pertains to the local customer ID; | | > if ‘F’, foreign customer ID. | | | | - collectCcy: This refers to the bank collection currency. | | | | - rateType: This refers to the rate type for retrieving the | | > exchange rate to convert the calculation from the charge | | > agreement currency to the transaction currency. | | | | - sDate: This refers to the start date of the transaction. | | | | - eDate: This refers to the end date of the transaction. | | | | - from: This refers to the location of the sender of the | | > express fee or cable charges. | | | | - to: This refers to the location of the recipient of the | | > express fee or cable charges. | | | | - baseDay: This refers to the base number of days for one year | | > that is used in the calculation of interest. | | | | - plusTimes: This defines the number of times the charges are | | > calculated. | | | | - extendFld: This is currently a reserved parameter. | | | | - overWitAgreeSSS: This is reserved for future use. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | var parameter = | | ['USD','100000','IMCO_COLL_COMM',DV.LEVEL_BUSINESS_UNIT,' | | L','06130cus01','USD','Booking | | rate','2011-3-23','2011-4-23','US','CN','360',null,null,nu | | ll]; | | | | var result = DV.callCalcServiceWithStartLevel(parameter); | +———————————————————————–+

#######

####### VAT APIs

+———————————————————————–+ | getVatType() | +=======================================================================+ | This is used to get the VAT type. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE]{.underline}: | | | | var vattype = charge.getVatType(); | +———————————————————————–+ | getVatEditable() | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to get the editable property of the VAT Type field. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE]{.underline}: | | | | var vatedit = charge.getVatEditable(); | +———————————————————————–+ | setVatType(vatType) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to set the VAT type. The vatType parameter can have any | | of the following values: | | | | - VAT | | | | - Stamp | | | | - Free | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE]{.underline}: | | | | if ( vattype == "Vat"){ | | | | charge.setVatType("Free"); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | setVatEditable(flag) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to set the editable property of the VAT Type field. | | | | If the flag property is set to true, the VAT Type field becomes | | editable. If set to false, the VAT Type field is not editable. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE]{.underline}: | | | | if ( vattype == "Stamp"){ | | | | charge.setVatEditable(false); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+

Server Side JS APIs

Special types of Charge APIs are defined in order to configure the calculation for charges using the Charge Component. Alternatively, Server Side JS APIs are also made available, which may be used for setting, defining, and manipulating charge data, without specifying the relevant tags for the charge component in the transaction JSP file.

The special types of Server Side JS APIs for Charge are as follows.

Charge Initialization APIs

The following APIs are used to define the initial charge data settings.

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Client Side API | Server Side API | Server Side API | | | | Description | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | Chg.init(trx2RuleType | DV.init(trx2ChgType, | This method is used | | , | chg2CollType, | to set the initial | | rule2ChgType, | rule2UnpaidType, | exchange rate to be | | rule2BalType, | unpaid2CollType) | used for charge | | bal2ChgType, | | transactions, such as | | trx2RuleCalcFunc, | | Booking Rate, Buying | | rule2ChgCalcFunc, | | Rate, or Selling | | rule2BalCalcFunc, | | Rate, etc. | | bal2ChgCalcFunc) | | | | | | - trx2ChgType: | | | | Exchange Rate | | | | applied between | | | | Transaction- and | | | | Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - chg2CollType: | | | | Exchange Rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Collect- | | | | and Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - rule2UnpaidType: | | | | Exchange Rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Unpaid- | | | | and Charge | | | | Agreement-Currenc | | | | y | | | | | | | | - unpaid2CollType: | | | | Exchange Rate | | | | applied between | | | | Charge Collect- | | | | and Charge | | | | Unpaid-Currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | DV.init("Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate", "Booking | | | | Rate"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.mapLocalCu | DV.mapLocalCust(custI | This method is used | | st(idField, | D, | to define the field | | nameField) | custName, custCCY, | names that are | | | custACNO) | related to the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - custID: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer Id. | | | | | | | | - custName: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer name. | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the local | | | | customer account | | | | number. | | | | (Conditional) | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.mapLocalCust("APP | | | | L_ID","APPL_NM", | | | | “CUST_PAY_CCY","C | | | | UST_ACNO"); | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | Chg.Screen.mapForeign | DV.mapForeignCust | This method is used | | Cust(idField, | (custID, custName, | to define the field | | | custCCY, custACNO) | names that are | | nameField, ccyField, | | related to the local | | acNoField) | | customer. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - custID: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer Id. | | | | | | | | - custName:This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the coreign | | | | customer Name. | | | | | | | | - custCCY: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | ‘Foreign Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | | | | | - custACNO: This is | | | | the field name of | | | | the foreign | | | | customer account | | | | number field name | | | | (Conditional) | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.mapForeignCust("B | | | | ENE_ID", | | | | "BENE_NM", | | | | "BENE_CCY", | | | | "BENE_ACNO"); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | CHG_setAllLocalPayCc | DV.setAllLocalPayCcy( | This method is used | | y(PayCcy) | ccy) | to set the value of | | | | the ‘Local Customer | | | | Pay CCY’ field. | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | local customer | | | | payment currency. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setAllLocalPayCcy( | | | | 'USD') | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | CHG_setAllCollCcy(Co | DV.setAllCollCcy(ccy) | This method is used | | llCcy) | | to set the initial | | | | charge collect | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | bank collection | | | | currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setAllCollCcy('US | | | | D'); | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | CHG_setAllBalCcy(bal | DV.AllsetUnpaidCcy(cc | This method is used | | Ccy) | y) | to set the initial | | | | the charge unpaid | | | | currency. | | | | | | | | - ccy: This is the | | | | charge unpaid | | | | currency | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | DV.AllsetUnpaidCcy(' | | | | USD'); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | CHG_setAllChargeAt(c | DV.setAllPayAt(payAt | This is used to set | | hargeAt) | | the initial value of | | | | the ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | DV.CHG_AT_TRANS | | | | ACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | DV.CHG_AT_DEFER | | | | RED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | DV.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). The | | | | default value is | | | | CHG_AT_TRANSACT | | | | ION. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setAllPayAt(DV.CHG | | | | _AT_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | User can change this | DV.setPayAt(commCode, | This is used to set | | property on the | payAt) | the initial value of | | Screen | | the ‘Paid At’ field | | | | in a transaction with | | | | a commission code. | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - commCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payAt: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | DV.CHG_AT_TRANS | | | | ACTION | | | | (Transaction), | | | | DV.CHG_AT_DEFER | | | | RED | | | | (Deferred), | | | | DV.CHG_AT_FREE | | | | (Waived). The | | | | default value is | | | | DV.CHG_AT_TRANS | | | | ACTION. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setPayAt('IPLC_O | | | | PEN_COMM',DV.CHG_A | | | | T_TRANSACTION); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | CHG_setAllChargeFor( | DV.setAllPayBy(payBy) | This is used to set | | chgFor) | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | Parameter: | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid By’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: DV. | | | | CHG_FOR_LOCAL | | | | (Applicant), and | | | | DV.CHG_FOR_FORE | | | | IGN | | | | (Beneficiary). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setAllPayBy(DV.CHG | | | | _FOR_LOCAL); | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | User can change this | DV.setPayBy(comCode, | This is used to set | | property on Screen | payBy) | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field in a | | | | transaction with a | | | | commission code. | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - comCode: This is | | | | the name of the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | - payBy: This is | | | | the value of the | | | | ‘Paid At’ field. | | | | The possible | | | | values are | | | | DV.CHG_FOR_LOCA | | | | L | | | | (Local Customer), | | | | and | | | | DV.CHG_FOR_FORE | | | | IGN | | | | (Foreign | | | | Customer). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | If the charge is paid | | | | by the ‘Local | | | | Customer’: | | | | | | | | DV.setPayBy('IPLC_O | | | | PEN_COMM',DV.CHG_F | | | | OR_LOCAL); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-30 .CS-head2}

Charge Calculation APIs

The following APIs are used to define the calculation for charges.

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Client Side API | Server Side API | Server Side API | | | | Description | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | Add this on Screen | DV.addTrxCharge(comCo | This method is used | | File | de) | to add a charge with | | | | a commission code. | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - comCode: This is | | | | the commission | | | | code list array | | | | or commission | | | | code string | | | | defined in the | | | | standing module | | | | | | | | This returns a | | | | transaction charge | | | | object. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | To add a Letter of | | | | Credit Issue | | | | Commission | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | 'IPLC_OPEN_COMM,EP | | | | LC_POST_CHG'; | | | | | | | | var trxChg = | | | | DV.addTrxCharge(comLi | | | | st); | | | | | | | | or | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘]; | | | | | | | | DV.addTrxCharge(comLi | | | | st); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Auto Get Data | DV.setDefChargeScope( | This is used to | | | scope) | define the condition | | | | when retrieving | | | | deferred charges | | | | (i.e., transaction | | | | reference, main | | | | reference). | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - scope: This is | | | | the condition for | | | | retrieving the | | | | deferred charges. | | | | The possible | | | | values are: | | | | SCOPE_MAINREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | the main or whole | | | | transaction), | | | | TRXREF (deferred | | | | charges are to be | | | | retrieved from a | | | | transaction | | | | reference), | | | | MAINWITHTRXREF | | | | (deferred charges | | | | are to be | | | | retrieved from | | | | both the main and | | | | transaction | | | | reference). | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setDefChargeScope( | | | | DV.SCOPE_MAINREF); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Auto Get Data | DV.capureDefChargesBy | This method is used | | | Scope() | to retrieve the | | | | deferred charges | | | | according to the | | | | condition defined in | | | | the | | | | DV.setDefChargeScope( | | | | ) | | | | system method. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | DV.setDefChargeScope( | | | | DV.SCOPE_MAINREF); | | | | | | | | DV. | | | | capureDefChargesBySco | | | | pe() | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | User can change this | DV.setDiscRate(chg, | Set Charge Discount | | property on Screen | rate) | Rate | | | | | | | | - chg: This is the | | | | commission code | | | | or the commission | | | | code string list | | | | array | | | | | | | | - rate: This is the | | | | discount rate | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | DV.setDiscRate(comLis | | | | t,'20'); | | | | | | | | or | | | | | | | | DV.setDiscRate('IPLC | | | | _OPEN_COMM','20' | | | | ); | | | | 20% | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.calculate(commCod | DV.calculate(commList | This method is used | | eArr, | Arr, | to calculate charges. | | trxCcy, amount, | calPara) | | | sDate, eDate, from, | | Parameters: | | to, baseDay, | | | | plusTimes, | | - commListArr: This | | extendFldsArr) | | is the commission | | | | code list array. | | | | The array follows | | | | this order: | | | | Commission Code1, | | | | Commission | | | | Code 2. | | | | | | | | - calPara: This | | | | is the parameter | | | | string array, | | | | which may contain | | | | the following | | | | variables. | | | | | | | | - trxCcy is the | | | | currency of | | | | the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - amount is the | | | | amount | | | | involved in | | | | the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - sDate is the | | | | start date of | | | | the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - eDate is the | | | | end date of | | | | the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | - from is the | | | | location of | | | | the sender of | | | | the express | | | | fee. | | | | | | | | - to is the | | | | location of | | | | the recipient | | | | of the | | | | express fee. | | | | | | | | - baseDay is | | | | the base | | | | number of | | | | days used in | | | | the | | | | calculation | | | | of interests. | | | | | | | | - plusTimes is | | | | the number of | | | | times the | | | | charges are | | | | to be | | | | calculated. | | | | | | | | - extendFldsArr | | | | allows the | | | | values of the | | | | fields to be | | | | stored, | | | | making these | | | | fields | | | | reusable. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var parameter = | | | | ['USD','100000', | | | | '2011-3-23','2011- | | | | 4-23','US','CN', | | | | '360','null',null | | | | ]; | | | | | | | | var comList = | | | | ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM\ | | | | ‘,’ | | | | EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | | | | | | | var result = | | | | DV.calculate(comList, | | | | parameter); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Auto Execute | DV. confirmCharge() | This method is used | | | | to confirm all the | | | | specified Charge | | | | information and | | | | calculate the charge | | | | in the AP server. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | DV.confirmCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getLocalCo | DV.getLocalTotalColle | This is used to get | | llectTotalAmt() | ctAmt() | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollAmt | | | | = | | | | DV.getLocalTotalColle | | | | ctAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getLocalCo | DV.getLocalTotalColle | This is used to get | | llectChgTotalAmt() | ctCharge() | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var localTotalCollChg | | | | = | | | | DV.getLocalTotalColle | | | | ctCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getLocalCo | DV.getLocalTotalColle | This is used to get | | llectVatTotalAmt() | ctVAT() | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalCollVAT | | | | = | | | | DV.getLocalTotalColle | | | | ctVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getLocalPa | DV.getLocalTotalPayAm | This is used to get | | yTotalAmt() | t() | the total amount paid | | | | by the local | | | | customer, including | | | | charge and VAT | | | | payments. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayAmt = | | | | DV.getLocalTotalPayAm | | | | t(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getLocalPa | DV.getLocalTotalPayCh | This is used to get | | yChgTotalAmt() | arge() | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the local customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayChg = | | | | DV.getLocalTotalPayCh | | | | arge(); | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | Chg.Screen.getLocalPa | DV.getLocalTotalPayVA | This is used to get | | yVatTotalAmt() | T() | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the local | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var locaTotalPayVAT = | | | | DV.getLocalTotalPayVA | | | | T(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getForeign | DV.getForeignTotalCol | This is used to get | | CollectTotalAmt() | lectAmt() | the total amount, | | | | including the charge | | | | amount and VAT | | | | amount, collected | | | | from the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollAmt = | | | | DV.getForeignTotalCol | | | | lectAmt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getForeign | DV.getForeignTotalCol | This is used to get | | CollectChgTotalAmt() | lectCharge() | the total amount of | | | | bank charges | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollChg = | | | | DV.getForeignTotalCol | | | | lectCharge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getForeign | DV.getForeignTotalCol | This is used to get | | CollectVatTotalAmt() | lectVAT() | the total VAT amount | | | | collected from the | | | | foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalCollVAT = | | | | DV.getForeignTotalCol | | | | lectVAT(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getForeign | DV.getForeignTotalPay | This is used to get | | PayTotalAmt() | Amt() | the total amount paid | | | | by the foreign | | | | customer, including | | | | the charge payment | | | | and VAT payment | | | | amounts. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayAmt = | | | | DV.getForeignTotalPay | | | | Amt(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getForeign | DV.getForeignTotalPay | This is used to get | | PayChgTotalAmt() | Charge() | the total amount of | | | | bank charges paid by | | | | the foreign customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var | | | | forTotalPayCharges = | | | | DV.getForeignTotalPay | | | | Charge(); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Chg.Screen.getForeign | DV.getForeignTotalPay | This is used to get | | PayVatTotalAmt() | VAT() | the total VAT amount | | | | paid by the foreign | | | | customer. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var forTotalPayVAT = | | | | DV.getForeignTotalPay | | | | VAT(); | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | N/A | DV.setVatType(String | This is used to set | | | commCode, String | the VAT type for | | | vatType) | batch processing. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the | | | | commission code | | | | which VAT type is | | | | to be set. | | | | | | | | - String vatType: | | | | This is the VAT | | | | type to be set | | | | for the | | | | commission code. | | | | This can have any | | | | of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - VAT | | | | | | | | - Stamp | | | | | | | | - Free | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setVatType(‘IMCO_ | | | | SDC_OTHER_COMM’, | | | | ‘VAT’) | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | N/A | DV.setDefVatType(Stri | This is used to | | | ng | define the VAT type | | | commCode, String | to be set if the | | | vatType) | corresponding Paid At | | | | setting is Deferred | | | | for batch processing. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the | | | | commission code | | | | which VAT type is | | | | to be set. | | | | | | | | - String vatType: | | | | This is the VAT | | | | type to be set | | | | for the | | | | commission code. | | | | This can have any | | | | of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - VAT | | | | | | | | - Stamp | | | | | | | | - Free | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setDefVatType(‘IMC | | | | O_SDC_OTHER_COMM’, | | | | ‘VAT’) | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | N/A | DV.setVatRate(String | This is used to set | | | commCode, String | the VAT rate for | | | vatRate) | batch processing. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the | | | | commission code | | | | which VAT rate is | | | | to be set. | | | | | | | | - String vatRate: | | | | This is the VAT | | | | rate to be set | | | | for the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | DV.setVatRate(‘IMCO_ | | | | SDC_OTHER_COMM’, | | | | 10) | +=======================+=======================+=======================+ | N/A | DV.agrementOverrideBu | This is used to | | | ild() | override an agreement | | | | for transactions | | | | included in a batch | | | | process. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | var percentage = | | | | DV.getFieldValue("SD | | | | C_PCT"); | | | | | | | | var agrOverBuild = | | | | DV.agrementOverrideBu | | | | ild(); | | | | | | | | agrOverBuild.appendVa | | | | lueDirect('F_BASE_ | | | | PERCENTAGE', | | | | percentage); | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | N/A | DV.setDefVatRate(Stri | This is used to | | | ng | define the VAT rate | | | commCode, String | to be set if the | | | vatRate) | corresponding Paid At | | | | setting is Deferred | | | | for batch processing. | | | | | | | | Parameters: | | | | | | | | - String commCode: | | | | This is the | | | | commission code | | | | which VAT type is | | | | to be set. | | | | | | | | - String vatRate: | | | | This is the VAT | | | | rate to be set | | | | for the | | | | commission code. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE]{.underlin | | | | e}: | | | | | | | | - DV.setDefVatRate( | | | | ‘IMCO_SDC_OTHER_CO | | | | MM’, 11) | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————————————————————–+ | Examples: | | | | - To initialize the charges | | | | > DV.init("Booking Rate", "Booking Rate", "Booking Rate", | | > "Booking Rate"); | | > | | > DV.mapLocalCust("APPL_ID","APPL_NM","CUST_PAY_CCY","CUST | | _ACNO"); | | > | | > DV.mapForeignCust ("BENE_ID", "BENE_NM", "BENE_CCY", | | > "BENE_ACNO"); | | > | | > DV.setAllLocalPayCcy ('USD'); | | > | | > DV.setAllCollCcy ('USD'); | | > | | > DV.AllsetUnpaidCcy('USD'); | | > | | > DV.setAllPayAt (DV.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION); | | > | | > DV.setAllPayBy(DV.CHG_FOR_LOCAL); | | > | | > … | | | | - To create and set the charge calculation parameters | | | | > var trxAmt = DV.getTrxFieldValue (‘LC_AMT’); | | > | | > var trxCCY = DV.getTrxFieldValue (‘LC_CCY’); | | > | | > var issueDate = DV.getTrxFieldValue (‘ISSUE_DT’); | | > | | > var endDate = DV.getTrxFieldValue (‘EXPIRY_DT’); | | > | | > var parameter = [trxCCY, trxAmt, issueDate, | | > endDate,'US','CN','360',null,null]; | | | | - To add a charge | | | | > DV.addTrxCharge(['IPLC_OPEN_COMM']); | | > | | > var comList =[ 'IPLC_OPEN_COMM’,‘EPLC_POST_CHG']; | | > | | > DV.addTrxCharge(comList); | | > | | > DV.setDiscRate('IPLC_OPEN_COMM',20); | | > | | > DV.setPayBy('IPLC_OPEN_COMM',DV.CHG_FOR_LOCAL); | | > | | > DV.setPayAt('IPLC_OPEN_COMM',DV.CHG_AT_TRANSACTION);… | | | | - To invoke the calculation method | | | | > var parameter = | | > ['USD','100000','2011-3-23','2011-4-23','US','CN','36 | | 0',null,null]; | | > | | > var comArr = ['IPLC_OPEN_COMM',’ EPLC_POST_CHG’]; | | > | | > var result = DV.calculate(comArr,parameter); | | > | | > DV.writeLog (DV.getLocalTotalCollectAmt()); | | > | | > … | | | | - To retrieve the deferred charge: | | | | > DV.setDefChargeScope(DV.SCOPE_MAINREF); | | > | | > DV.capureDefChargeByScope(); | | > | | > … | | | | - To confirm the dynamic charge | | | | > DV.confirmCharge(); | | > | | > … | | | | - To retrieve the total amount, VAT, or charge. | | | | > var locaTotalCollAmt = DV. getLocalTotalCollectAmt(); | | > | | > var locaTotalCollVAT = DV. getLocalTotalCollectVAT(); | | > | | > var locaTotalCollChg = DV.getLocalTotalCollectCharge(); | +———————————————————————–+

Payment APIs

Payment APIs

The APIs used for the Payment component are as follows.

+———————————————————————–+ | SYS_GetFldSumByDoName(vDo,sFldName) | +=======================================================================+ | This API is used to get the sum of the values of a field in a data | | object. This name must be unique among the elements of the given DO. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - vDo: This is the name of the data object. | | | | - sFldName: This is the field, from a data object with multiple | | records, which sum is to be obtained. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_GetFldSumByDoName(vDo,sFldName){ | | | | try{ | | | | return DoRoot.getFieldSumByDoName(vDo,sFldName); | | | | }catch(e){ | | | | throwExcp("PaymentDo_CAL",e); | | | | } | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_GetCurrentEditDo(doName) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to retrieve the name of the DO that is currently being | | edited. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - doName: This is the name of the data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_GetCurrentEditDo(doName){ | | | | return DoRoot.getEditDoByName(doName); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_GetCurrentDoStatus(doName) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to retrieve the current status of a data object. | | | | This returns either value: | | | | - A, for Add; or | | | | - E, for Edit. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - doName: This is the name of the data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_GetCurrentDoStatus(doName){ | | | | return DoRoot.getCurrDoStatus(doName); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_AddOneDoRecord(doName, parentObj) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to add a DO record for the DO automatically (grid). | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - doName: This is the name of the data object. | | | | - parentObj: This is the name of the parent data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_AddOneDoRecord(doName,parentObj){ | | | | return DoRoot.addOneDoRecord(doName,parentObj); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_DeleteDoRecord(doName,sDoIndex) | +———————————————————————–+ | This API is used to delete a specific DO record. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - doName: This is the name of the data object. | | | | - sDoIndex: This is the index number of the DO record. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_DeleteDoRecord(doName,sDoIndex){ | | | | return DoRoot.deleteDoRecord(doName,sDoIndex); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_RefreshDoGrid(doObjs) | +———————————————————————–+ | This API is used to update the values of the DO records in the DO | | grid. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - doObj: This is the name of the data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_RefreshDoGrid(doObjs){ | | | | return DoRoot.refreshDoGrid(doObjs); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_GetFldValueByDo(doObj,name) | +———————————————————————–+ | This API is used to retrieve the value of a field from a data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - doObj: This is the name of the data object. | | | | - name: This is the name of the DO field. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_GetFldValueByDo(doObj,name){ | | | | return DoRoot.getFldValueByDo(doObj,name); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_UpdateFldValueByDo(doObj,name,value) | +———————————————————————–+ | This API is used to update the value of a field in a data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - doObj: This is the name of the data object. | | | | - name: This is the name of the DO field. | | | | - value: This is the value to be assigned to the DO field. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_UpdateFldValueByDo(doObj,name,value){ | | | | return DoRoot.updateFldValueByDo(doObj,name,value); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_DisableDoButton(doName,btName,value) | +———————————————————————–+ | This API is used to disable a button in the DO grid. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameters: | | | | - doName: This is the name of the data object. | | | | - btName: This is the DO button. | | | | - value: This may have either value – | | | | - True, in which case the button is disabled; or | | | | - False, in which case the button is enabled. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE: ]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_DisableDoButton(doName,btName,value){ | | | | return DoRoot.disableDoButton(doName,btName,value); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+ | SYS_GetObjByDoName(doName) | +———————————————————————–+ | This is used to retrieve the DO object according to the DO name. | +———————————————————————–+ | Parameter: | | | | - doName: This is the name of the data object. | +———————————————————————–+ | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | function SYS_GetObjByDoName(doName) { | | | | return DoRoot.getDoByName(doName); | | | | } | +———————————————————————–+

Limits Security and System Parameters

Limits Security and System Parameters

The following are the available security parameters and system parameters that are used in the Limit Management and Limit Transaction modules.

Security Parameters

The security parameters for the Limits modules are as follows.

LIMIT_LOCAL_PATH

This is used to define the Limits receive file path.

LIMIT_SFTP_PRE

This is used to define the prefix of the configured Limits property.

LMTS_CONTROL_PARA_BY_UNIT

This security system parameter is used to control whether the system filters the limit control parameter either by country code or by unit code. This may have one of the following values:

  • TRUE, in which the system filters the limit control parameter using

    C_BK_GROUP_ID + C_CNTY_CODE + C_UNIT_CODE

  • FALSE, in which the system filters the limit control parameter by

    C_BK_GROUP_ID + C_CNTY_CODE. This is the default value.

{#section-31 .CS-head2}

System Parameter

The following is the system parameter for the Limits modules.

LMTS_SHARE_STATEMENT

This parameter is used to control whether the system is to prompt that the limit may be shared and displays the LMTS Share List window after a transaction is confirmed. This parameter may have one of the following values:

  • TRUE, in which the system displays the LMTS Share List window if a transaction goes overlimit and Share Limit settings exist for the customer

  • FALSE, in which a transaction that goes overlimit may not be confirmed

{#section-32 .CS-ChapterTitle}

{#section-33 .CS-ChapterTitle}

eLOAN System Parameters

eLOAN System Parameters

The following are the eLOAN system parameters.

+———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMOUNT_ROUND_TYPE | +=======================================================================+ | This controls how the amount in an exchange entry is to be rounded | | off. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - U, for Round Up | | | | - D, for Round Down | | | | - R, for Round (Default) | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMZ_EXTENSION_CHECK_DUEDATE | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates whether or not the eLOAN Due Date validation is to be | | performed in case when the eLOAN amortization is extended. When this | | parameter is not added, the original system processing logic applies. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Y, for Yes (Default), in which the system checks the following: | | | | - the New Due Date of amortization extension event should not | | be equal to the Original Due Date | | | | - the Transaction Value Date of the amortization rxtension | | event should be equal to Last Due Date. | | | | | | | | - N, for No, in which the system does not check that the | | Transaction Value Date of the amortization extension event is | | equal to Last Due Date. | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMZ_PARTIAL_PAYINT | +———————————————————————–+ | There are two conditions for updating the value of the column | | IA_C_STATUS_FLAG in the table IAAC_AMZMASTERLAY to F, which | | indicates that the corresponding transaction is closed: | | | | - the principal has been paid off in amortization transactions | | | | - total posted interest-partial pay interest<=0 | | | | The system parameter IA_AMZ_PARTIAL_PAYINT is used to update the | | value of the column IA_C_STATUS_FLAG in the table | | IAAC_AMZMASTERLAY to F whether or not the second condition is | | satisfied. | +———————————————————————–+
